word.spanish1909: Entonces el rey quitó su anillo de su mano, y diólo á Amán hijo de Amadatha Agageo, enemigo de los Judíos,
word.latinvulgate: Tulit ergo rex annulum, quo utebatur, de manu sua, et dedit eum Aman filio Amadathi de progenie Agag, hosti Judæorum,
word.italian1927: Allora il re si tolse l’anello di mano, e lo diede a Haman l’Agaghita figliuolo di Hammedatha, e nemico de’ Giudei.
word.german1912: Da tat der König seinen Ring von der Hand und gab ihn Haman, dem Sohn Hammadathas, dem Agagiter, der Juden Feind.
word.french1910: Le roi ôta son anneau de la main, et le remit à Haman, fils d'Hammedatha, l'Agaguite, ennemi des Juifs.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是王從自己的手中取下戒指，交給猶大人的敵人，亞甲族哈米大他的兒子哈曼。
word.korean: 왕이 반지를 손에서 빼어 유다인의 대적 곧 아각 사람 함므다다의 아들 하만에게 주며
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y hinubad ng hari ang kaniyang singsing sa kaniyang kamay, at ibinigay kay Aman na anak ni Amedatha na Agageo, na kaaway ng mga Judio.
word.maori: Na ka unuhia e te kingi tona mowhiti i tona ringa, a hoatu ana ki a Hamana tama a Hamerata Akaki, ki te hoariri o nga Hurai.
word.cebuano: Ug ang hari mikuha sa iyang singsing gikan sa iyang kamot, ug gihatag kini kang Aman anak nga lalake ni Amadatha ang Agagehanon, ang kaaway sa mga Judio.
word.hebrew: י ויסר המלך את טבעתו מעל ידו ויתנה להמן בן המדתא האגגי--צרר היהודים
word.hebrewmodern: ויסר המלך את טבעתו מעל ידו ויתנה להמן בן המדתא האגגי צרר היהודים׃
word.greekot: καὶ περιελόμενος ὁ βασιλεὺς τὸν δακτύλιον ἔδωκεν εἰς χεῖρα τῷ αμαν σφραγίσαι κατὰ τῶν γεγραμμένων κατὰ τῶν ιουδαίων

word.kjv: For we are sold, I and my people, to be destroyed, to be slain, and to perish. But if we had been sold for bondmen and bondwomen, I had held my tongue, although the enemy could not countervail the king's damage.
word.thailand: เพราะพวกเราถูกขายทั้งหม่อมฉันและชนชาติของหม่อมฉันให้ถูกทำลาย ให้ถูกสังหารและให้ถูกล้างผลาญ ถ้าพวกเราถูกขายเพียงให้เป็นทาสชายและหญิง หม่อมฉันก็จะอดกลั้นสงบไว้ เพราะความทุกข์ยากของเราจะเปรียบกับผลเสียหายของกษัตริย์นั้นก็ไม่ได้"
word.spanish1909: Porque vendidos estamos yo y mi pueblo, para ser destruídos, para ser muertos y exterminados. Y si para siervos y siervas fuéramos vendidos, callárame, bien que el enemigo no compensara el daño del rey.
word.latinvulgate: Traditi enim sumus ego et populus meus, ut conteramur, jugulemur, et pereamus. Atque utinam in servos et famulas venderemur : esset tolerabile malum, et gemens tacerem : nunc autem hostis noster est, cujus crudelitas redundat in regem.
word.italian1927: Perché io e il mio popolo siamo stati venduti per esser distrutti, uccisi, sterminati. Ora se fossimo stati venduti per diventare schiavi e schiave, mi sarei taciuta; ma il nostro avversario non potrebbe riparare al danno fatto al re con la nostra morte".
word.german1912: Denn wir sind verkauft, ich und mein Volk, daß wir vertilgt, erwürgt und umgebracht werden. Und wären wir doch nur zu Knechten und Mägden verkauft, so wollte ich schweigen; so würde der Feind doch dem König nicht schaden.
word.french1910: Car nous sommes vendus, moi et mon peuple, pour être détruits, égorgés, anéantis. Encore si nous étions vendus pour devenir esclaves et servantes, je me tairais, mais l'ennemi ne saurait compenser le dommage fait au roi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為我和我的族人被人出賣，快要毀滅，被殺盡、滅絕了。我們若是只被賣為奴婢，我也必閉口不言，但王的損失是敵人不能補償的。”
word.korean: 나와 내 민족이 팔려서 죽임과 도륙함과 진멸함을 당하게 되었나이다 만일 우리가 노비로 팔렸더면 내가 잠잠하였으리이다 그래도 대적이 왕의 손해를 보충하지 못하였으리이다'
word.tagalog: Sapagka't kami ay naipagbili, ako at ang aking bayan upang ipahamak, upang patayin, at upang lipulin. Nguni't kung kami ay naipagbili na mga pinakaaliping lalake at babae, ako'y tumahimik, bagaman hindi mababayaran ng kaaway ang bagabag sa hari.
word.maori: Kua oti hoki matou, ahau me toku iwi, te hoko kia whakangaromia, kia whakamatea, kia huna. Otiia me i hokona matou hei pononga tane, hei pononga wahine, kua whakarongo puku ahau: e kore ano ia e rite i te hoariri nga mea a te kingi ka maumauria n ei.
word.cebuano: Kay kami gibaligya, ako ug ang akong katawohan, aron pagalaglagon, ug pagapatyon, ug pagapohoon. Apan kong kami gibaligya, ingon nga mga binihag nga lalake ug babaye mihilum ako, bisan ang kabatok dili makabalus tungod sa kadaut sa hari.
word.hebrew: ד כי נמכרנו אני ועמי להשמיד להרוג ולאבד ואלו לעבדים ולשפחות נמכרנו החרשתי--כי אין הצר שוה בנזק המלך  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: כי נמכרנו אני ועמי להשמיד להרוג ולאבד ואלו לעבדים ולשפחות נמכרנו החרשתי כי אין הצר שוה בנזק המלך׃
word.greekot: ἐπράθημεν γὰρ ἐγώ τε καὶ ὁ λαός μου εἰς ἀπώλειαν καὶ διαρπαγὴν καὶ δουλείαν ἡμεῖς καὶ τὰ τέκνα ἡμῶν εἰς παῖδας καὶ παιδίσκας καὶ παρήκουσα οὐ γὰρ ἄξιος ὁ διάβολος τῆς αὐλῆς τοῦ βασιλέως

word.kjv: And Esther said, The adversary and enemy is this wicked Haman. Then Haman was afraid before the king and the queen.
word.thailand: และพระนางเอสเธอรทูลว่า "คู่อริและศัตรูคือฮามานคนโหดร้ายผู้นี้เพคะ" ฮามานก็กลัวอยู่ต่อพระพักตร์กษัตริย์และพระราชินี
word.spanish1909: Y Esther dijo: El enemigo y adversario es este malvado Amán. Entonces se turbó Amán delante del rey y de la reina.
word.latinvulgate: Dixitque Esther : Hostis et inimicus noster pessimus iste est Aman. Quod ille audiens, illico obstupuit, vultum regis ac reginæ ferre non sustinens.
word.italian1927: Ester rispose: "L’avversario, il nemico, è quel malvagio di Haman". Allora Haman fu preso da terrore in presenza del re e della regina.
word.german1912: Esther sprach: Der Feind und Widersacher ist dieser böse Haman. Haman entsetzte sich vor dem König und der Königin.
word.french1910: Esther répondit: L'oppresseur, l'ennemi, c'est Haman, ce méchant-là! Haman fut saisi de terreur en présence du roi et de la reine.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以斯帖回答：“這敵人和仇人，就是這惡人哈曼！”哈曼在王和王后面前立刻驚惶萬分。
word.korean: 에스더가 가로되 `대적과 원수는 이 악한 하만이니이다 !' 하니 하만이 왕과 왕후 앞에서 두려워하거늘
word.tagalog: At sinabi ni Esther, Ang isang kaaway at kaalit: itong masamang si Aman. Nang magkagayo'y natakot si Aman sa harap ng hari at ng reina.
word.maori: Ano ra ko Ehetere, He hoariri, he hoa whawhai, anei ko te Hamana kino nei. Katahi ka mataku a Hamana i te aroaro o te kingi raua ko te kuini.
word.cebuano: Ug si Ester miingon: Usa ka kabatok ug usa ka kaaway, bisan kining dautan nga Aman. Unya si Aman nahadlok sa atubangan sa hari ug sa reina.
word.hebrew: ו ותאמר אסתר--איש צר ואויב המן הרע הזה והמן נבעת מלפני המלך והמלכה
word.hebrewmodern: ותאמר אסתר איש צר ואויב המן הרע הזה והמן נבעת מלפני המלך והמלכה׃
word.greekot: εἶπεν δὲ εσθηρ ἄνθρωπος ἐχθρὸς αμαν ὁ πονηρὸς οὗτος αμαν δὲ ἐταράχθη ἀπὸ τοῦ βασιλέως καὶ τῆς βασιλίσσης

word.kjv: On that day did the king Ahasuerus give the house of Haman the Jews' enemy unto Esther the queen. And Mordecai came before the king; for Esther had told what he was unto her.
word.thailand: ในวันนั้นกษัตริย์อาหสุเอรัสพระราชทานวงศ์วานของฮามานศัตรูของพวกยิวแก่พระราชินีเอสเธอร์ โมรเดคัยก็เข้าเฝ้ากษัตริย์ เพราะพระนางเอสเธอร์ได้ทูลว่าท่านเป็นอะไรกับพระนาง
word.spanish1909: EL MISMO día dió el rey Assuero á la reina Esther la casa de Amán enemigo de los Judíos; y Mardochêo vino delante del rey, porque Esther le declaró lo que era respecto de ella.
word.latinvulgate: Die illo dedit rex Assuerus Esther reginæ domum Aman adversarii Judæorum, et Mardochæus ingressus est ante faciem regis. Confessa est enim ei Esther quod esset patruus suus.
word.italian1927: In quello stesso giorno il re Assuero donò alla regina Ester la casa di Haman, il nemico dei Giudei. E Mardocheo si presentò al re, al quale Ester avea dichiarato la parentela che l’univa a lui.
word.german1912: An dem Tage gab der König Ahasveros der Königin Esther das Haus Hamans, des Judenfeindes. Und Mardochai kam vor den König; denn Esther sagte an, wie er ihr zugehörte.
word.french1910: En ce même jour, le roi Assuérus donna à la reine Esther la maison d'Haman, l'ennemi des Juifs; et Mardochée parut devant le roi, car Esther avait fait connaître la parenté qui l'unissait à elle.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 末底改榮升高位當日，亞哈隨魯把猶大人的敵人哈曼的家產，賜給王后以斯帖；末底改也來到王的面前，因為以斯帖已經把末底改和她的關係告訴王。
word.korean: 당일에 아하수에로왕이 유다인의 대적 하만의 집을 왕후 에스더에게 주니라 에스더가 모르드개는 자기에게 어떻게 관계됨을 왕께 고한고로 모르드개가 왕의 앞에 나아오니
word.tagalog: Nang araw na yaon ay ibinigay ng haring Assuero ang bahay ni Aman na kaaway ng mga Judio kay Esther na reina. At si Mardocheo ay naparoon sa harap ng hari; sapagka't isinaysay ni Esther kung ano niya siya.
word.maori: ¶ No taua ra ka homai e Kingi Ahahueruha ki a Kuini Ehetere te whare o Hamana, hoariri o nga Hurai. A ka haere a Mororekai ki te aroaro o te kingi, na Ehetere hoki i whakaatu he whanaunga ia nona.
word.cebuano: Niadtong adlawa gihatag ni hari Assuero ang balay ni Aman ang kaaway sa mga Judio kang Ester nga reina. Ug si Mardocheo miadto sa atubangan sa hari; kay si Ester nagsugilon kong ig-unsa siya kaniya.
word.hebrew: א ביום ההוא נתן המלך אחשורוש לאסתר המלכה את בית המן צרר היהודיים (היהודים) ומרדכי בא לפני המלך--כי הגידה אסתר מה הוא לה
word.hebrewmodern: ביום ההוא נתן המלך אחשורוש לאסתר המלכה את בית המן צרר היהודיים ומרדכי בא לפני המלך כי הגידה אסתר מה הוא לה׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐν αὐτῇ τῇ ἡμέρᾳ ὁ βασιλεὺς ἀρταξέρξης ἐδωρήσατο εσθηρ ὅσα ὑπῆρχεν αμαν τῷ διαβόλῳ καὶ μαρδοχαῖος προσεκλήθη ὑπὸ τοῦ βασιλέως ὑπέδειξεν γὰρ εσθηρ ὅτι ἐνοικείωται αὐτῇ

word.kjv: The ten sons of Haman the son of Hammedatha, the enemy of the Jews, slew they; but on the spoil laid they not their hand.
word.thailand: คือเขาสังหารบุตรชายทั้งสิบของฮามาน บุตรชายฮัมเมดาธา ศัตรูของพวกยิว แต่เขามิได้ปล้นข้าวของ
word.spanish1909: Diez hijos de Amán hijo de Amadatha, enemigo de los Judíos: mas en la presa no metieron su mano.
word.latinvulgate: Quos cum occidissent, prædas de substantiis eorum tangere noluerunt.
word.italian1927: figliuolo di Hammedatha, il nemico de’ Giudei, ma non si diedero al saccheggio.
word.german1912: die zehn Söhne Hamans, des Sohne Hammedathas, des Judenfeindes. Aber an die Güter legten sie ihre Hände nicht.
word.french1910: les dix fils d'Haman, fils d'Hammedatha, l'ennemi des Juifs. Mais ils ne mirent pas la main au pillage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這十個人就是哈米大他的孫子、哈曼的兒子，猶大人的敵人；至於財物，猶大人卻沒有下手掠奪。
word.korean: 곧 함므다다의 손자요, 유다인의 대적 하만의 열 아들을 죽였으나 그 재산에는 손을 대지 아니하였더라
word.tagalog: Na sangpung anak ni Aman, na anak ni Amedatha, na kaaway ng mga Judio, ay pinatay nila; nguni't sa pagsamsam, hindi nila binuhat ang kanilang kamay.
word.maori: Ko nga tama kotahi tekau a Hamana tama a Hamerata, a te hoariri o nga Hurai, patua iho e ratou; kihai ia o ratou ringa i pa ki nga taonga.
word.cebuano: Ang napulo ka mga anak nga lalake ni Aman, anak nga lalake ni Amadatha, ang kaaway sa mga Judio ilang gipapatay; apan sa inagaw wala sila manghilabut.
word.hebrew: י עשרת  {ר} בני המן בן המדתא צרר היהודים--הרגו ובבזה--לא שלחו את ידם
word.hebrewmodern: עשרת בני המן בן המדתא צרר היהודים הרגו ובבזה לא שלחו את ידם׃
word.greekot: ἐν αὐτῇ τῇ ἡμέρᾳ ἐπεδόθη ὁ ἀριθμὸς τῷ βασιλεῖ τῶν ἀπολωλότων ἐν σούσοις

word.kjv: Because Haman the son of Hammedatha, the Agagite, the enemy of all the Jews, had devised against the Jews to destroy them, and had cast Pur, that is, the lot, to consume them, and to destroy them;
word.thailand: เพราะฮามานบุตรชายฮัมเมดาธา คนอากัก ศัตรูของพวกยิวทั้งปวง ได้ปองร้ายต่อพวกยิวเพื่อทำลายเขา ได้ทอดเปอร์ คือสลาก เพื่อล้างผลาญและทำลายเขา
word.spanish1909: Porque Amán hijo de Amadatha, Agageo, enemigo de todos los Judíos, había ideado contra los Judíos para destruirlos, y echó Pur, que quiere decir suerte, para consumirlos y acabar con ellos.
word.latinvulgate: Aman enim, filius Amadathi stirpis Agag, hostis et adversarius Judæorum, cogitavit contra eos malum, ut occideret illos, atque deleret : et misit phur, quod nostra lingua vertitur in sortem.
word.italian1927: poiché Haman, figliuolo di Hammedatha, l’Agaghita, il nemico di tutti i Giudei, aveva ordito una trama contro i Giudei per distruggerli, e avea gettato il Pur, vale a dire la sorte, per sgominarli e farli perire;
word.german1912: wie Haman, der Sohn Hammedathas, der Agagiter, aller Juden Feind, gedacht hatte, alle Juden umzubringen, und das Pur, das ist das Los, werfen lassen, sie zu erschrecken und umzubringen;
word.french1910: Car Haman, fils d'Hammedatha, l'Agaguite, ennemi de tous les Juifs, avait formé le projet de les faire périr, et il avait jeté le pur, c'est-à-dire le sort, afin de les tuer et de les détruire;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 原本猶大人的敵人，亞甲族哈米大他的兒子哈曼曾經設謀陷害猶大人，要消滅他們；他弄卜“普珥”，就是抽籤，為要打擊和消滅猶大人。
word.korean: 곧 아각 사람 함므다다의 아들 모든 유다인의 대적 하만이 유다인을 진멸하기를 꾀하고 부르 곧 제비를 뽑아 저희를 죽이고 멸하려 하였으나
word.tagalog: Sapagka't si Aman na anak ni Amedatha na Agageo, na kaaway ng lahat na Judio ay nagbanta laban sa mga Judio upang lipulin sila, at pinagsapalaran nga ang Pur, upang patayin, at upang lipulin sila;
word.maori: He mea mo ta Hamana tama a Hamerata Akaki; ko te hoariri nei ia o nga Hurai katoa; whakaaroa ana e ia he he mo nga Hurai, kia huna ratou; a maka ana e ia he Puri, ara he rota mo ratou kia whakamotitia, kia huna;
word.cebuano: Tungod kay si Aman ang anak nga lalake ni Amadatha nga Agagehanon, ang kaaway sa tanang mga Judio, naglalang batok sa mga Judio aron sa paglaglag kanila, ug nagpagula ug Pur, nga mao ang rifa, aron sa pagut-ut kanila; ug sa paglaglag kanila.
word.hebrew: כד כי המן בן המדתא האגגי צרר כל היהודים--חשב על היהודים לאבדם והפל פור הוא הגורל להמם ולאבדם
word.hebrewmodern: כי המן בן המדתא האגגי צרר כל היהודים חשב על היהודים לאבדם והפיל פור הוא הגורל להמם ולאבדם׃
word.greekot: καὶ ὡς εἰσῆλθεν πρὸς τὸν βασιλέα λέγων κρεμάσαι τὸν μαρδοχαῖον ὅσα δὲ ἐπεχείρησεν ἐπάξαι ἐπὶ τοὺς ιουδαίους κακά ἐπ' αὐτὸν ἐγένοντο καὶ ἐκρεμάσθη αὐτὸς καὶ τὰ τέκνα αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Or, Deliver me from the enemy's hand? or, Redeem me from the hand of the mighty?
word.thailand: หรือว่า `ขอช่วยข้าให้พ้นจากมือของปฏิปักษ์' หรือว่า `ขอไถ่ข้าจากมือของผู้มีอำนาจ' หรือ
word.spanish1909: Y libradme de la mano del opresor, Y redimidme del poder de los violentos?
word.latinvulgate: vel : Liberate me de manu hostis, et de manu robustorum eruite me ?
word.italian1927: o "liberatemi dalla stretta del nemico, o "scampatemi di man dei prepotenti"?
word.german1912: und errettet mich aus der Hand des Feindes und erlöst mich von der Hand der Gewalttätigen?
word.french1910: Délivrez-moi de la main de l'ennemi, Rachetez-moi de la main des méchants?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 或我說過‘救我脫離敵人的手’，或說‘贖我脫離強暴人的手’嗎？
word.korean: 내가 언제 말하기를 대적의 손에서 나를 구원하라 하더냐 ? 포악한 자의 손에서 나를 구속하라 하더냐 ?
word.tagalog: O, Iligtas mo ako sa kamay ng kaaway? O, tubusin mo ako sa kamay ng mga namimighati?
word.maori: I mea ranei, whakaorangia ahau i te ringa o te hoariri? Hokona ahau i roto i te ringa o te kaitukino?
word.cebuano: Kun, Luwasa ako gikan sa kamot sa kaaway? Kun, Bawia ako gikan sa kamot sa mga malupigon?
word.hebrew: כג  ומלטוני מיד-צר    ומיד עריצים תפדוני
word.hebrewmodern: ומלטוני מיד צר ומיד עריצים תפדוני׃
word.greekot: ὥστε σῶσαί με ἐξ ἐχθρῶν ἢ ἐκ χειρὸς δυναστῶν ῥύσασθαί με

word.kjv: Wherefore hidest thou thy face, and holdest me for thine enemy?
word.thailand: ทำไมพระองค์ทรงเมินพระพักตร์เสีย และทรงนับว่าข้าพระองค์เป็นศัตรูของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: ¿Por qué escondes tu rostro, Y me cuentas por tu enemigo?
word.latinvulgate: Cur faciem tuam abscondis, et arbitraris me inimicum tuum ?
word.italian1927: Perché nascondi il tuo volto, e mi tieni in conto di nemico?
word.german1912: Warum verbirgst du dein Antlitz und hältst mich für deinen Feind?
word.french1910: Pourquoi caches-tu ton visage, Et me prends-tu pour ton ennemi?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你為甚麼掩面，把我當作你的仇敵呢？
word.korean: 주께서 어찌하여 얼굴을 가리우시고 나를 주의 대적으로 여기시나이까 ?
word.tagalog: Bakit ikinukubli mo ang iyong mukha, at inaari mo akong iyong kaaway?
word.maori: He aha tou mata i huna ai e koe? He aha ahau i kiia ai e koe he hoariri?
word.cebuano: Ngano man nga gitago mo ang imong nawong kanako, Ug ginaisip mo ako nga imong kaaway?
word.hebrew: כד  למה-פניך תסתיר    ותחשבני לאויב לך
word.hebrewmodern: למה פניך תסתיר ותחשבני לאויב לך׃
word.greekot: διὰ τί ἀπ' ἐμοῦ κρύπτῃ ἥγησαι δέ με ὑπεναντίον σοι

word.kjv: He teareth me in his wrath, who hateth me: he gnasheth upon me with his teeth; mine enemy sharpeneth his eyes upon me.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงฉีกข้าด้วยพระพิโรธของพระองค์และทรงเกลียดชังข้า พระองค์ทรงขบเขี้ยวเคี้ยวฟันใส่ข้า ปรปักษ์ของข้าถลึงตาสู้ข้า
word.spanish1909: Su furor me destrizó, y me ha sido contrario: Crujió sus dientes contra mí; Contra mí aguzó sus ojos mi enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: Rugæ meæ testimonium dicunt contra me, et suscitatur falsiloquus adversus faciem meam, contradicens mihi.
word.italian1927: La sua ira mi lacera, mi perseguita, digrigna i denti contro di me. Il mio nemico aguzza gli occhi su di me.
word.german1912: Sein Grimm zerreißt, und der mir gram ist, beißt die Zähne über mich zusammen; mein Widersacher funkelt mit seinen Augen auf mich.
word.french1910: Il me déchire et me poursuit dans sa fureur, Il grince des dents contre moi, Il m'attaque et me perce de son regard.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的怒氣撕裂我，攻擊我；他向我咬牙切齒，我的敵人以銳利的眼光看著我。
word.korean: 그는 진노하사 나를 찢고 군박하시며 나를 향하여 이를 갈고 대적이 되어 뾰족한 눈으로 나를 보시고
word.tagalog: Niluray niya ako sa kaniyang kapootan, at inusig ako; pinagngangalitan niya ako ng kaniyang mga ngipin: pinangdidilatan ako ng mga mata ng aking kaaway.
word.maori: Haehaea ana ahau e ia i a ia e riri ana, e tukino ana ia i ahau; pakiri ana ona niho ki ahau; e whakakoi mai ana toku hoariri i ona kanohi ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Ako gilaksi niya sa iyang kapungot, ug ginalutos ako; Batok kanako gipakagot niya ang iyang mga ngipon: Ang akong kabatok nagatutuk sa iyang mga mata kanako.
word.hebrew: ט  אפו טרף וישטמני--חרק עלי בשניו    צרי ילטש עיניו לי
word.hebrewmodern: אפו טרף וישטמני חרק עלי בשניו צרי ילטוש עיניו לי׃
word.greekot: ὀργῇ χρησάμενος κατέβαλέν με ἔβρυξεν ἐπ' ἐμὲ τοὺς ὀδόντας βέλη πειρατῶν αὐτοῦ ἐπ' ἐμοὶ ἔπεσεν

word.kjv: Let mine enemy be as the wicked, and he that riseth up against me as the unrighteous.
word.thailand: ขอให้ศัตรูของข้าเป็นเหมือนคนชั่ว และขอให้ผู้ที่ลุกขึ้นต่อสู้ข้าเป็นเหมือนคนอธรรม
word.spanish1909: Sea como el impío mi enemigo, Y como el inicuo mi adversario.
word.latinvulgate: Sit ut impius, inimicus meus, et adversarius meus, quasi iniquus.
word.italian1927: Sia trattato da malvagio il mio nemico e da perverso chi si leva contro di me!
word.german1912: Aber mein Feind müsse erfunden werden als ein Gottloser, und der sich wider mich auflehnt, als ein Ungerechter.
word.french1910: Que mon ennemi soit comme le méchant, Et mon adversaire comme l'impie!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願我的敵人如惡人一般，願那起來攻擊我的像不義的人一樣。
word.korean: 나의 대적은 악인 같이 되고 일어나 나를 치는 자는 불의한 자같이 되기를 원하노라
word.tagalog: Ang aking kaaway ay maging gaya nawa ng masama, at ang bumangon laban sa akin ay maging gaya nawa ng liko.
word.maori: ¶ Ko toku hoariri, kia rite ia ki te tangata kino; ko te tangata e whakatika mai ana ki ahau, kia rite ia ki te tangata hara.
word.cebuano: Pasagdi nga ang akong kaaway maingon sa dautan, Ug kadtong moasdang batok kanako nga maingon sa dili matarung.
word.hebrew: ז  יהי כרשע איבי    ומתקוממי כעול
word.hebrewmodern: יהי כרשע איבי ומתקוממי כעול׃
word.greekot: οὐ μὴν δὲ ἀλλὰ εἴησαν οἱ ἐχθροί μου ὥσπερ ἡ καταστροφὴ τῶν ἀσεβῶν καὶ οἱ ἐπ' ἐμὲ ἐπανιστανόμενοι ὥσπερ ἡ ἀπώλεια τῶν παρανόμων

word.kjv: Behold, he findeth occasions against me, he counteth me for his enemy,
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระองค์ทรงหาเรื่องกับข้าพเจ้า พระองค์ทรงนับว่าข้าพเจ้าเป็นศัตรูกับพระองค์
word.spanish1909: He aquí que él buscó achaques contra mí, Y me tiene por su enemigo;
word.latinvulgate: Quia querelas in me reperit, ideo arbitratus est me inimicum sibi.
word.italian1927: ma Dio trova contro me degli appigli ostili, mi tiene per suo nemico;
word.german1912: siehe, er hat eine Sache gegen mich gefunden, er achtet mich für einen Feind;
word.french1910: Et Dieu trouve contre moi des motifs de haine, Il me traite comme son ennemi;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神找機會攻擊我，把我當作仇敵；
word.korean: 하나님이 나를 칠 틈을 찾으시며 나를 대적으로 여기사
word.tagalog: Narito, siya'y nakasumpong ng kadahilanan laban sa akin, ibinilang niya ako na pinakakaaway:
word.maori: Na e rapu ana ia i te take riri ki ahau, e kiia ana ahau e ia he hoariri nona;
word.cebuano: Ania karon, siya nakakaplag ug mga higayon batok kanako, Giisip niya ako nga iyang kaaway;
word.hebrew: י  הן תנואות עלי ימצא    יחשבני לאויב לו
word.hebrewmodern: הן תנואות עלי ימצא יחשבני לאויב לו׃
word.greekot: μέμψιν δὲ κατ' ἐμοῦ εὗρεν ἥγηται δέ με ὥσπερ ὑπεναντίον

word.kjv: If I have rewarded evil unto him that was at peace with me; (yea, I have delivered him that without cause is mine enemy:)
word.thailand: ถ้าข้าพระองค์ตอบแทนความชั่วแก่ผู้ที่อยู่อย่างสันติกับข้าพระองค์ (แต่ผู้ที่เป็นศัตรูด้วยปราศจากเหตุ ข้าพระองค์เคยช่วยผู้นั้นให้รอดพ้นไป)
word.spanish1909: Si dí mal pago al pacífico conmigo, (Hasta he libertado al que sin causa era mi enemigo;)
word.latinvulgate: Domine Deus meus, si feci istud, si est iniquitas in manibus meis,
word.italian1927: se ho reso mal per bene a chi viveva meco in pace (io che ho liberato colui che m’era nemico senza cagione),
word.german1912: habe ich Böses vergolten denen, so friedlich mit mir lebten, oder die, so mir ohne Ursache feind waren, beschädigt:
word.french1910: Si j'ai rendu le mal à celui qui était paisible envers moi, Si j'ai dépouillé celui qui m'opprimait sans cause,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果我以惡回報那與我為友的人，或是無故掠奪與我為敵的人，
word.korean: 화친한 자를 악으로 갚았거나 내 대적에게 무고히 빼앗았거든
word.tagalog: Kung ako'y gumanti ng kasamaan sa kaniya na may kapayapaan sa akin; (Oo, aking pinawalan siya, na walang anomang kadahilanan ay naging aking kaaway:)
word.maori: Ki te mea i whakahokia e ahau he kino ki te tangata kua mau nei ta maua rongo; i whakaora nei hoki ahau i te tangata i kino noa mai ki ahau:
word.cebuano: Kong ako nagbalus ug dautan kaniya nga diha sa pakigdatit uban kanako; (Oo, akong gitugyan siya nga sa walay gipasikaran nahimong akong kabatok);
word.hebrew: ד  יהוה אלהי אם-עשיתי זאת    אם-יש-עול בכפי
word.hebrewmodern: אם גמלתי שולמי רע ואחלצה צוררי ריקם׃
word.greekot: κύριε ὁ θεός μου εἰ ἐποίησα τοῦτο εἰ ἔστιν ἀδικία ἐν χερσίν μου

word.kjv: Let the enemy persecute my soul, and take it; yea, let him tread down my life upon the earth, and lay mine honour in the dust. Selah.
word.thailand: ก็ขอให้ศัตรูข่มเหงจิตวิญญาณข้าพระองค์ทัน และให้เขาเหยียบย่ำชีวิตข้าพระองค์ลงถึงดิน และวางเกียรติยศของข้าพระองค์ไว้ในผงคลี เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: Persiga el enemigo mi alma, y alcánce la; Y pise en tierra mi vida, Y mi honra ponga en el polvo. (Selah.)
word.latinvulgate: si reddidi retribuentibus mihi mala, decidam merito ab inimicis meis inanis.
word.italian1927: perseguiti pure il nemico l’anima mia e la raggiunga, e calpesti al suolo la mia vita, e stenda la mia gloria nella polvere. Sela.
word.german1912: so verfolge mein Feind meine Seele und ergreife sie und trete mein Leben zu Boden und lege meine Ehre in den Staub. (Sela.)
word.french1910: Que l'ennemi me poursuive et m'atteigne, Qu'il foule à terre ma vie, Et qu'il couche ma gloire dans la poussière! -Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 就任憑仇敵追趕我，直到追上，把我的性命踐踏在地上，使我的光榮歸於塵土。（細拉）
word.korean: 원수로 나의 영혼을 쫓아 잡아 내 생명을 땅에 짓밟고 내 영광을 진토에 떨어뜨리게 하소서 (셀라)
word.tagalog: Habulin ng kaaway ang aking kaluluwa, at abutan; Oo, yapakan niya ang aking kaluluwa sa lupa, at ilagay ang aking kaluwalhatian sa alabok. (Selah)
word.maori: Kia arumia toku wairua e te hoariri, a kia mau; kia takahia hoki toku ora e ia ki te whenua, kia whakatokotoria ano toku kororia ki te puehu. (Hera.
word.cebuano: Ipalutos sa kaaway ang akong kalag, ug hiagpasan kini; Oo, patumbi kaniya ngadto sa yuta ang akong kinabuhi, Ug ang akong himaya ibutang diha sa abug. (Selah
word.hebrew: ה  אם-גמלתי שולמי רע    ואחלצה צוררי ריקם
word.hebrewmodern: ירדף אויב נפשי וישג וירמס לארץ חיי וכבודי לעפר ישכן סלה׃
word.greekot: εἰ ἀνταπέδωκα τοῖς ἀνταποδιδοῦσίν μοι κακά ἀποπέσοιν ἄρα ἀπὸ τῶν ἐχθρῶν μου κενός

word.kjv: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.
word.thailand: จากปากของเด็กอ่อนและเด็กที่ยังดูดนม พระองค์ทรงตั้งกำลังเพราะบรรดาคู่อริของพระองค์ เพื่อระงับยับยั้งศัตรูและผู้กระทำการแก้แค้น
word.spanish1909: De la boca de los chiquitos y de los que maman, fundaste la fortaleza, A causa de tus enemigos, Para hacer cesar al enemigo, y al que se venga.
word.latinvulgate: Domine, Dominus noster, quam admirabile est nomen tuum in universa terra ! quoniam elevata est magnificentia tua super cælos.
word.italian1927: Dalla bocca de’ fanciulli e de’ lattanti tu hai tratto una forza, per cagione de’ tuoi nemici, per ridurre al silenzio l’avversario e il vendicatore.
word.german1912: Aus dem Munde der jungen Kinder und Säuglinge hast du eine Macht zugerichtet um deiner Feinde willen, daß du vertilgest den Feind und den Rachgierigen.
word.french1910: Par la bouche des enfants et de ceux qui sont à la mamelle Tu as fondé ta gloire, pour confondre tes adversaires, Pour imposer silence à l'ennemi et au vindicatif.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因你仇敵的緣故，你從小孩和嬰兒的口中，得著了讚美（“得著了讚美”或譯：“建立了能力”），使仇敵和報仇的無話可說。
word.korean: 주의 대적을 인하여 어린 아이와 젖먹이의 입으로 말미암아 권능을 세우심이여 이는 원수와 보수자로 잠잠케 하려 하심이니이다
word.tagalog: Mula sa bibig ng mga sanggol at ng mga sumususo ay iyong itinatag ang kalakasan, dahil sa iyong mga kaaway, upang iyong patahimikin ang kaaway at ang manghihiganti.
word.maori: U pu i a koe te kaha o te mangai o nga kohungahunga, o nga mea ngote u hei mea mo ou hoariri, hei pehi mo te hoariri, mo te kairapu utu.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa baba sa mga magagmayng bata ug sa mga nagasuso gipahamutang mo ang kalig-on, Tungod sa imong mga kabatok, Aron ikaw makapahilum sa kaaway ug sa tigpanimalus.
word.hebrew: ב  יהוה אדנינו--    מה-אדיר שמך בכל-הארץ אשר תנה הודך    על-השמים
word.hebrewmodern: מפי עוללים וינקים יסדת עז למען צורריך להשבית אויב ומתנקם׃
word.greekot: κύριε ὁ κύριος ἡμῶν ὡς θαυμαστὸν τὸ ὄνομά σου ἐν πάσῃ τῇ γῇ ὅτι ἐπήρθη ἡ μεγαλοπρέπειά σου ὑπεράνω τῶν οὐρανῶν

word.kjv: O thou enemy, destructions are come to a perpetual end: and thou hast destroyed cities; their memorial is perished with them.
word.thailand: โอ ศัตรูเอ๋ย ความพินาศของเจ้าได้สำเร็จเป็นนิตย์ พระองค์ทรงทำลายบรรดาหัวเมืองของเขา และที่ระลึกของเขาก็วอดวายพร้อมกับเขา
word.spanish1909: Oh enemigo, acabados son para siempre los asolamientos; Y las ciudades que derribaste, Su memoria pereció con ellas.
word.latinvulgate: Increpasti gentes, et periit impius : nomen eorum delesti in æternum, et in sæculum sæculi.
word.italian1927: E’ finita per il nemico! Son rovine perpetue! e delle città che tu hai distrutte perfin la memoria e perita.
word.german1912: Die Schwerter des Feindes haben ein Ende; die Städte hast du umgekehrt; ihr Gedächtnis ist umgekommen samt ihnen. {~}
word.french1910: Plus d'ennemis! Des ruines éternelles! Des villes que tu as renversées! Leur souvenir est anéanti.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 仇敵的結局到了，他們遭毀滅，直到永遠；你拆毀他們的城鎮，使它們湮沒無聞。
word.korean: 원수가 끊어져 영영히 멸망하셨사오니 주께서 무너뜨린 성읍들을 기억할 수 없나이다
word.tagalog: Ang kaaway ay dumating sa wakas, sila'y lipol magpakailan man; at ang mga siyudad na iyong dinaig, ang tanging alaala sa kanila ay napawi.
word.maori: Ko te hoariri, mutu pu ratou, he ngaromanga oti tonu iho: a ko nga pa i huna e koe, ngaro whakarere to ratou whakamaharatanga.
word.cebuano: Ang mga kaaway miabut na sa katapusan, gilaglag sila sa dayon; Ug ang mga ciudad nga gipanlumpag nimo, Ang mao gayud nga handumanan nila nahanaw na.
word.hebrew: ו  גערת גוים אבדת רשע    שמם מחית לעולם ועד
word.hebrewmodern: האויב תמו חרבות לנצח וערים נתשת אבד זכרם המה׃
word.greekot: ἐπετίμησας ἔθνεσιν καὶ ἀπώλετο ὁ ἀσεβής τὸ ὄνομα αὐτῶν ἐξήλειψας εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα καὶ εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τοῦ αἰῶνος

word.kjv: How long shall I take counsel in my soul, having sorrow in my heart daily? how long shall mine enemy be exalted over me?
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะต้องตรึกตรองในใจของข้าพระองค์ และมีความทุกข์โศกอยู่ในใจทุกวันนานเท่าใด ศัตรูของข้าพระองค์จะเหนือข้าพระองค์นานเท่าใด
word.spanish1909: ¿Hasta cuándo pondré consejos en mi alma, Con ansiedad en mi corazón cada día? ¿Hasta cuándo será enaltecido mi enemigo sobre mí?
word.latinvulgate: Dominus de cælo prospexit super filios hominum, ut videat si est intelligens, aut requirens Deum.
word.italian1927: Fino a quando avrò l’ansia nell’anima e l’affanno nel cuore tutto il giorno? Fino a quando s’innalzerà il mio nemico sopra me?
word.german1912: Wie lange soll ich sorgen in meiner Seele und mich ängsten in meinem Herzen täglich? Wie lange soll sich mein Feind über mich erheben?
word.french1910: Jusques à quand aurai-je des soucis dans mon âme, Et chaque jour des chagrins dans mon coeur? Jusques à quand mon ennemi s'élèvera-t-il contre moi?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我心裡籌算不安，內心終日愁苦，要到幾時呢？我的仇敵勝過我，要到幾時呢？
word.korean: 내가 나의 영혼에 경영하고 종일토록 마음에 근심하기를 어느 때까지 하오며 내 원수가 나를 쳐서 자긍하기를 어느 때까지 하리이까
word.tagalog: Hanggang kailan kukuhang payo ako sa aking kaluluwa, na may kalumbayan sa aking puso buong araw? Hanggang kailan magpapakataan ang aking kaaway sa akin?
word.maori: Kia pehea te roa o toku whakaaroaronga i roto i toku wairua, o te pouri i roto i toku ngakau i tenei ra, i tenei ra? Kia pehea te roa o te whakakake mai a toku hoariri ki ahau?
word.cebuano: Hangtud anus-a ba magapakitambag ako sa akong kalag, Nga adunay kaguol sa akong kasingkasing sa tibook nga adlaw? Hangtud anus-a ba pagabayawon ang akong kaaway sa ibabaw nako?
word.hebrew: ב  עד-אנה יהוה תשכחני נצח    עד-אנה תסתיר את-פניך ממני
word.hebrewmodern: עד אנה אשית עצות בנפשי יגון בלבבי יומם עד אנה ירום איבי עלי׃
word.greekot: κύριος ἐκ τοῦ οὐρανοῦ διέκυψεν ἐπὶ τοὺς υἱοὺς τῶν ἀνθρώπων τοῦ ἰδεῖν εἰ ἔστιν συνίων ἢ ἐκζητῶν τὸν θεόν

word.kjv: Lest mine enemy say, I have prevailed against him; and those that trouble me rejoice when I am moved.
word.thailand: เกรงว่าศัตรูของข้าพระองค์จะว่า "เราชนะเขาแล้ว" เกรงว่าคู่อริของข้าพระองค์จะเปรมปรีดิ์เพราะข้าพระองค์กำลังหวั่นไหว
word.spanish1909: Porque no diga mi enemigo, Vencílo: Mis enemigos se alegrarán, si yo resbalare.
word.latinvulgate: Nonne cognoscent omnes qui operantur iniquitatem, qui devorant plebem meam sicut escam panis ?
word.italian1927: che talora il mio nemico non dica: L’ho vinto! e i miei avversari non festeggino se io vacillo.
word.german1912: daß nicht mein Feind rühme, er sei mein mächtig geworden, und meine Widersacher sich nicht freuen, daß ich niederlage.
word.french1910: Afin que mon ennemi ne dise pas: Je l'ai vaincu! Et que mes adversaires ne se réjouissent pas, si je chancelle.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 免得我的仇敵說：“我勝過了他”；免得我跌倒的時候我的敵人就歡呼。
word.korean: 두렵건대 나의 원수가 이르기를 내가 저를 이기었다 할까 하오며 내가 요동될 때에 나의 대적들이 기뻐할까 하나이다
word.tagalog: Baka sabihin ng aking kaaway, ako'y nanaig laban sa kaniya; baka ang aking mga kaaway ay mangagalak pagka ako'y nakilos.
word.maori: Kei mea mai toku hoariri, Kua taea ia e ahau: kei whakamanamana oku hoariri, ina whakakorikoria ahau.
word.cebuano: Aron dili magaingon ang akong kaaway. Gidaug ko siya; Tingali unya ang akong mga kabatok managkalipay sa diha nga matarug ako.
word.hebrew: ד  הביטה ענני יהוה אלהי    האירה עיני פן-אישן המות
word.hebrewmodern: פן יאמר איבי יכלתיו צרי יגילו כי אמוט׃
word.greekot: οὐχὶ γνώσονται πάντες οἱ ἐργαζόμενοι τὴν ἀνομίαν οἱ κατεσθίοντες τὸν λαόν μου βρώσει ἄρτου τὸν κύριον οὐκ ἐπεκαλέσαντο

word.kjv: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them which hated me: for they were too strong for me.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงช่วยข้าพเจ้าให้พ้นจากศัตรูเข้มแข็งของข้าพเจ้า และจากบรรดาผู้ที่เกลียดชังข้าพเจ้า เพราะเขามีอานุภาพเกินกว่าข้าพเจ้ามากนัก
word.spanish1909: Libróme de mi poderoso enemigo, Y de los que me aborrecían, aunque eran ellos más fuertes que yo.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Mi riscosse dal mio potente nemico, e da quelli che mi odiavano perch’eran più forti di me.
word.german1912: Er errettete mich von meinen starken Feinden, von meinen Hassern, die mir zu mächtig waren,
word.french1910: Il me délivra de mon adversaire puissant, De mes ennemis qui étaient plus forts que moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他救我脫離我的強敵，脫離那些恨我的人，因為他們比我強盛。
word.korean: 나를 강한 원수와 미워하는 자에게서 건지셨음이여 저희는 나보다 힘센 연고로다
word.tagalog: Iniligtas niya ako sa aking malakas na kaaway, At sa mga nangagtatanim sa akin, sapagka't sila'y totoong makapangyarihan sa ganang akin.
word.maori: Nana ahau i ora ai i toku hoariri kaha, i te hunga e kino ana ki ahau; he kaha rawa hoki ratou i ahau.
word.cebuano: Giluwas niya ako gikan sa akong gamhanan nga kaaway, ug gikan niadtong mga nanagdumot kanako; kay sila hilabihan sa pagkakusganon alang kanako.
word.hebrew: יז  ישלח ממרום יקחני    ימשני ממים רבים
word.hebrewmodern: יצילני מאיבי עז ומשנאי כי אמצו ממני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And hast not shut me up into the hand of the enemy: thou hast set my feet in a large room.
word.thailand: และมิได้ทรงมอบข้าพระองค์ไว้ในมือของศัตรู พระองค์ทรงวางเท้าของข้าพระองค์ไว้ในที่กว้างขวาง
word.spanish1909: Y no me encerraste en mano del enemigo; Hiciste estar mis pies en anchura.
word.latinvulgate: Intellectum tibi dabo, et instruam te in via hac qua gradieris ; firmabo super te oculos meos.
word.italian1927: e non m’hai dato in man del nemico; tu m’hai messo i piedi al largo.
word.german1912: und übergibst mich nicht in die Hände des Feindes; du stellst meine Füße auf weiten Raum.
word.french1910: Et tu ne me livreras pas aux mains de l'ennemi, Tu mettras mes pieds au large.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你沒有把我交在仇敵的手裡，你使我的腳站穩在寬闊之地。
word.korean: 나를 대적의 수중에 금고치 아니하셨고 내 발을 넓은 곳에 세우셨음이니이다
word.tagalog: At hindi mo kinulong sa kamay ng kaaway; iyong inilagay ang aking mga paa sa maluwag na dako.
word.maori: Kahore ahau i kopia e koe ki roto ki te ringa o te hoariri: kua whakaturia e koe oku waewae ki te wahi nui.
word.cebuano: Ug wala mo ako palukbi sa kamot sa kaaway; Gipahamutang mo ang akong mga tiil sa kinalapdan.
word.hebrew: ח  אגילה ואשמחה    בחסדך אשר ראית את-עניי    ידעת בצרות נפשי
word.hebrewmodern: ולא הסגרתני ביד אויב העמדת במרחב רגלי׃
word.greekot: συνετιῶ σε καὶ συμβιβῶ σε ἐν ὁδῷ ταύτῃ ᾗ πορεύσῃ ἐπιστηριῶ ἐπὶ σὲ τοὺς ὀφθαλμούς μου

word.kjv: By this I know that thou favourest me, because mine enemy doth not triumph over me.
word.thailand: โดยข้อนี้ ข้าพระองค์ทราบว่า พระองค์ทรงพอพระทัยในข้าพระองค์ คือศัตรูของข้าพระองค์ไม่ได้ชนะข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: En esto habré conocido que te he agradado, Que mi enemigo no se holgará de mí.
word.latinvulgate: Dum confringuntur ossa mea, exprobraverunt mihi qui tribulant me inimici mei, dum dicunt mihi per singulos dies : Ubi est Deus tuus ?
word.italian1927: Da questo io riconoscerò che tu mi gradisci, se il mio nemico non trionferà di me.
word.german1912: Dabei merke ich, daß du Gefallen an mir hast, daß mein Feind über mich nicht jauchzen wird.
word.french1910: Je connaîtrai que tu m'aimes, Si mon ennemi ne triomphe pas de moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因此我就知道你喜愛我，因為我的仇敵不能向我歡呼誇勝。
word.korean: 나의 원수가 승리치 못하므로 주께서 나를 기뻐하시는 줄을 내가 아나이다
word.tagalog: Sa pamamagitan nito ay natatalastas ko na nalulugod ka sa akin, sapagka't ang aking kaaway ay hindi nagtatagumpay sa akin.
word.maori: Na konei ahau i matau ai e pai ana koe ki ahau, no te mea kahore toku hoariri e whakamanamana ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Pinaagi niini maila ko nga ikaw nahamuot kanako, Tungod kay ang akong kaaway dili makadaug kanako.
word.hebrew: יא  ואתה יהוה חנני והקימני    ואשלמה להם
word.hebrewmodern: בזאת ידעתי כי חפצת בי כי לא יריע איבי עלי׃
word.greekot: ἐν τῷ καταθλάσαι τὰ ὀστᾶ μου ὠνείδισάν με οἱ θλίβοντές με ἐν τῷ λέγειν αὐτούς μοι καθ' ἑκάστην ἡμέραν ποῦ ἐστιν ὁ θεός σου

word.kjv: I will say unto God my rock, Why hast thou forgotten me? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าทูลพระเจ้าศิลาของข้าพเจ้าว่า "ไฉนพระองค์ทรงลืมข้าพระองค์เสีย ไฉนข้าพระองค์จึงต้องไปอย่างเป็นทุกข์ เพราะการบีบบังคับของศัตรู"
word.spanish1909: Diré á Dios: Roca mía, ¿por qué te has olvidado de mí? ¿Por qué andaré yo enlutado por la opresión del enemigo?
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io dirò a Dio, ch’è la mia ròcca: Perché mi hai dimenticato? Perché vo io vestito a bruno per l’oppression del nemico?
word.german1912: Ich sage zu Gott, meinem Fels: Warum hast du mein vergessen? Warum muß ich so traurig gehen, wenn mein Feind mich drängt?
word.french1910: Je dis à Dieu, mon rocher: Pourquoi m'oublies-tu? Pourquoi dois-je marcher dans la tristesse, Sous l'oppression de l'ennemi?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要對　神我的磐石說：“你為甚麼忘記我呢？我為甚麼因仇敵的壓迫徘徊悲哀呢？”
word.korean: 내 반석이신 하나님께 말하기를 어찌하여 나를 잊으셨나이까 ? 내가 어찌하여 원수의 압제로 인하여 슬프게 다니나이까 하리로다
word.tagalog: Aking sasabihin sa Dios na aking malaking bato, bakit mo ako kinalimutan? Bakit ako'y yayaong tumatangis dahil sa pagpighati ng kaaway?
word.maori: Ka mea ahau ki te Atua, E toku kohatu, he aha koe i wareware ai ki ahau? He aha ahau ka haere pouri ai i te tukino a te hoariri?
word.cebuano: Magaingon ako sa Dios nga akong bato: Nganong hikalimtan mo ako? Ngano nga magalakaw ako nga magabalata tungod sa paglupig sa mga kaaway?
word.hebrew: ט  יומם יצוה יהוה חסדו    ובלילה שירה עמי-- תפלה    לאל חיי
word.hebrewmodern: אומרה לאל סלעי למה שכחתני למה קדר אלך בלחץ אויב׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For thou art the God of my strength: why dost thou cast me off? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทรงเป็นพระเจ้าแห่งกำลังของข้าพระองค์ ไฉนพระองค์ทรงทอดทิ้งข้าพระองค์เสีย ไฉนข้าพระองค์จึงต้องไปอย่างเป็นทุกข์เพราะการบีบบังคับของศัตรู
word.spanish1909: Pues que tú eres el Dios de mi fortaleza, ¿por qué me has desechado? ¿Por qué andaré enlutado por la opresión del enemigo?
word.latinvulgate: Deus, auribus nostris audivimus, patres nostri annuntiaverunt nobis, opus quod operatus es in diebus eorum, et in diebus antiquis.
word.italian1927: Poiché tu sei l’Iddio ch’è la mia fortezza; perché mi hai rigettato? Perché vo io vestito a bruno per l’oppression del nemico?
word.german1912: Denn du bist der Gott meine Stärke; warum verstößest du mich? Warum lässest du mich so traurig gehen, wenn mich mein Feind drängt?
word.french1910: Toi, mon Dieu protecteur, pourquoi me repousses-tu? Pourquoi dois-je marcher dans la tristesse, Sous l'oppression de l'ennemi?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你是賜我力量的　神。你為甚麼棄絕我呢？我為甚麼因仇敵的壓迫徘徊悲哀呢？
word.korean: 주는 나의 힘이 되신 하나님이시어늘 어찌하여 나를 버리셨나이까 ? 내가 어찌하여 원수의 압제로 인하여 슬프게 다니나이까 ?
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ikaw ang Dios ng aking kalakasan; bakit mo ako itinakuwil? Bakit ako yumayaong tumatangis dahil sa pagpighati ng kaaway?
word.maori: Ko koe hoki te Atua o toku kaha: he aha ahau ka panga nei e koe? He aha ahau ka haere pouri ai i te tukino a te hoariri?
word.cebuano: Kay ikaw mao ang Dios sa akong kalig-on; ngano nga gisalikway mo ako? Ngano nga magalakaw ako nga magabalata tungod sa paglupig sa kaaway?
word.hebrew: ב  כי-אתה אלהי מעוזי--    למה זנחתני למה-קדר אתהלך    בלחץ אויב
word.hebrewmodern: כי אתה אלהי מעוזי למה זנחתני למה קדר אתהלך בלחץ אויב׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεός ἐν τοῖς ὠσὶν ἡμῶν ἠκούσαμεν οἱ πατέρες ἡμῶν ἀνήγγειλαν ἡμῖν ἔργον ὃ εἰργάσω ἐν ταῖς ἡμέραις αὐτῶν ἐν ἡμέραις ἀρχαίαις

word.kjv: Thou makest us to turn back from the enemy: and they which hate us spoil for themselves.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงกระทำให้ข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายถอยกลับจากคู่อริ และคนที่เกลียดข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายก็ได้ของริบไป
word.spanish1909: Nos hiciste retroceder del enemigo, Y saqueáron nos para sí los que nos aborrecían.
word.latinvulgate: filiæ regum in honore tuo. Astitit regina a dextris tuis in vestitu deaurato, circumdata varietate.
word.italian1927: Tu ci fai voltar le spalle davanti al nemico, e quelli che ci odiano ci depredano.
word.german1912: Du lässest uns fliehen vor unserm Feind, daß uns berauben, die uns hassen.
word.french1910: Tu nous fais reculer devant l'ennemi, Et ceux qui nous haïssent enlèvent nos dépouilles.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你使我們在敵人面前轉身後退；憎恨我們的人都任意搶掠。
word.korean: 주께서 우리를 대적에게서 돌아서게 하시니 우리를 미워하는 자가 자기를 위하여 탈취하였나이다
word.tagalog: Iyong pinatatalikod kami sa kaaway: at silang nangagtatanim sa amin ay nagsisisamsam ng sa ganang kanilang sarili.
word.maori: Kua meinga matou kia hoki whakamuri mai i te hoariri; kei te pahua ano i etahi ma ratou te hunga e kino ana ki a matou.
word.cebuano: Gipasibog mo kami gikan sa among kabatok; Ug kadtong nanagdumot kanamo nanagpangagaw gikan kanamo alang sa ilang kaugalingon.
word.hebrew: י  אף-זנחת ותכלימנו    ולא-תצא בצבאותינו
word.hebrewmodern: תשיבנו אחור מני צר ומשנאינו שסו למו׃
word.greekot: θυγατέρες βασιλέων ἐν τῇ τιμῇ σου παρέστη ἡ βασίλισσα ἐκ δεξιῶν σου ἐν ἱματισμῷ διαχρύσῳ περιβεβλημένη πεποικιλμένη

word.kjv: For the voice of him that reproacheth and blasphemeth; by reason of the enemy and avenger.
word.thailand: เนื่องด้วยเสียงของคนเยาะเย้ย และคนหมิ่นประมาท เนื่องด้วยศัตรูและผู้แก้แค้น
word.spanish1909: Por la voz del que me vitupera y deshonra, Por razón del enemigo y del que se venga.
word.latinvulgate: Afferentur in lætitia et exsultatione ; adducentur in templum regis.
word.italian1927: all’udire chi mi vitupera e m’oltraggia, al vedere il nemico ed il vendicativo.
word.german1912: daß ich die Schänder und Lästerer hören und die Feinde und Rachgierigen sehen muß.
word.french1910: A la voix de celui qui m'insulte et m'outrage, A la vue de l'ennemi et du vindicatif.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 都因那辱罵和毀謗的人的聲音，並因仇敵和報仇者的緣故。
word.korean: 나를 비방하고 후욕하는 소리를 인함이요 나의 원수와 보수자의 연고니이다
word.tagalog: Dahil sa tinig niya na dumuduwahagi at tumutungayaw; dahil sa kaaway at sa manghihiganti.
word.maori: I te reo o te kaitawai, o te kaikohukohu; i te hoariri, i te kairapu utu.
word.cebuano: Tungod kay ang tingog niya nga nagatamay ug nagabalikas kanako, Pinaagi sa katarungan sa kaaway ug sa tigpapanimalus.
word.hebrew: טז  כל-היום כלמתי נגדי    ובשת פני כסתני
word.hebrewmodern: מקול מחרף ומגדף מפני אויב ומתנקם׃
word.greekot: ἀπενεχθήσονται ἐν εὐφροσύνῃ καὶ ἀγαλλιάσει ἀχθήσονται εἰς ναὸν βασιλέως

word.kjv: Because of the voice of the enemy, because of the oppression of the wicked: for they cast iniquity upon me, and in wrath they hate me.
word.thailand: เพราะเสียงของศัตรู เพราะการบีบบังคับของคนชั่ว เหตุว่าเขาฟ้องว่าข้าพระองค์ได้ทำความชั่วช้า และเขาบ่มความเกลียดชังข้าพระองค์โดยความโกรธ
word.spanish1909: A causa de la voz del enemigo, Por la opresión del impío; Porque echaron sobre mí iniquidad, Y con furor me han amenazado.
word.latinvulgate: Conculcaverunt me inimici mei tota die ; quoniam multi bellantes adversum me.
word.italian1927: per la voce del nemico, per l’oppressione dell’empio; poiché mi gettano addosso delle iniquità e mi perseguitano con furore.
word.german1912: daß der Feind so schreit und der Gottlose drängt; denn sie wollen mir eine Tücke beweisen und sind mir heftig gram.
word.french1910: A cause de la voix de l'ennemi et de l'oppression du méchant; Car ils font tomber sur moi le malheur, Et me poursuivent avec colère.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這都是由於仇敵的聲音，和惡人的欺壓；因為他們使禍患臨到我的身上，怒氣沖沖地迫害我。
word.korean: 이는 원수의 소리와 악인의 압제의 연고라 저희가 죄악으로 내게 더하며 노하여 나를 핍박하나이다
word.tagalog: Dahil sa tinig ng kaaway, dahil sa pagpighati ng masama; sapagka't sila'y naghagis ng kasamaan sa akin, at sa galit ay inuusig nila ako.
word.maori: I te reo hoki o te hoariri, i te tukino a te tangata kino: no te mea e utaina ana e ratou he hara ki runga ki ahau, a e kino ana ki ahau, e riri ana.
word.cebuano: Tungod sa tingog sa kaaway, Tungod sa pagdaugdaug sa mga dautan; Kay gihulog nila sa ibabaw nako ang kadautan, Ug sa kasuko gilutos nila ako.
word.hebrew: ג  הקשיבה לי וענני    אריד בשיחי ואהימה
word.hebrewmodern: מקול אויב מפני עקת רשע כי ימיטו עלי און ובאף ישטמוני׃
word.greekot: κατεπάτησάν με οἱ ἐχθροί μου ὅλην τὴν ἡμέραν ὅτι πολλοὶ οἱ πολεμοῦντές με ἀπὸ ὕψους

word.kjv: For it was not an enemy that reproached me; then I could have borne it: neither was it he that hated me that did magnify himself against me; then I would have hid myself from him:
word.thailand: มิใช่ศัตรูผู้เยาะเย้ยข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจะได้ทนได้ มิใช่ผู้ที่เกลียดชังข้าพเจ้าผู้พองตัวใส่ข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจะได้หลบเขาได้
word.spanish1909: Porque no me afrentó un enemigo, Lo cual habría soportado; Ni se alzó contra mí el que me aborrecía, Porque me hubiera ocultado de él:
word.latinvulgate: In me sunt, Deus, vota tua, quæ reddam, laudationes tibi :
word.italian1927: Poiché non è stato un nemico che mi ha fatto vituperio; altrimenti, l’avrei comportato; non è stato uno che m’odiasse a levarmisi contro; altrimenti, mi sarei nascosto da lui;
word.german1912: Wenn mich doch mein Feind schändete, wollte ich's leiden; und wenn mein Hasser wider mich pochte, wollte ich mich vor ihm verbergen.
word.french1910: Ce n'est pas un ennemi qui m'outrage, je le supporterais; Ce n'est pas mon adversaire qui s'élève contre moi, Je me cacherais devant lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 原來不是仇敵辱罵我，如果是仇敵，我還可以忍受；也不是恨我的人向我狂妄自大，如果是恨我的人，我還可以躲避他。
word.korean: 나를 책망한 자가 원수가 아니라 원수일진대 내가 참았으리라 나를 대하여 자기를 높이는 자가 나를 미워하는 자가 아니라 미워하는 자일진대 내가 그를 피하여 숨었으리라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't hindi kaaway ang dumuwahagi sa akin; akin nga sanang nabata: ni hindi rin ang nagtatanim sa akin ang nagmamalaki laban sa akin; nagtago nga sana ako sa kaniya:
word.maori: Ehara hoki i te hoariri nana ahau i tawai; penei e taea e ahau te whakaririka: ehara hoki i te hoa whawhai noku i whakakake ki ahau; penei kua piri ahau, kei kitea e ia.
word.cebuano: Kay dili usa ka kaaway ang mitamay kanako; Nan, makahimo unta ako sa pag-antus niini: Dili usab ang nagdumot kanako mao ang nagpadaku sa iyang kaugalingon batok kanako; Nan, motago unta ako sa akong kaugalingon gikan kaniya:
word.hebrew: יב  הוות בקרבה    ולא-ימיש מרחבה תך ומרמה
word.hebrewmodern: כי לא אויב יחרפני ואשא לא משנאי עלי הגדיל ואסתר ממנו׃
word.greekot: ἐπὶ τῷ θεῷ ἤλπισα οὐ φοβηθήσομαι τί ποιήσει μοι ἄνθρωπος

word.kjv: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทรงเป็นที่ลี้ภัยของข้าพระองค์ เป็นหอคอยเข้มแข็งที่ประจันหน้าศัตรู
word.spanish1909: Porque tú has sido mi refugio, Y torre de fortaleza delante del enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: Nam et ipse Deus meus et salutaris meus ; susceptor meus, non movebor amplius.
word.italian1927: poiché tu mi sei stato un rifugio, una forte torre dinanzi al nemico.
word.german1912: Denn du bist meine Zuversicht, ein starker Turm vor meinen Feinden.
word.french1910: Car tu es pour moi un refuge, Une tour forte, en face de l'ennemi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你作過我的避難所，作過我逃避仇敵的堅固堡壘。
word.korean: 주는 나의 피난처시요 원수를 피하는 견고한 망대심이니이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ikaw ay naging aking kanlungan, matibay na moog sa kaaway.
word.maori: He piringa hoki koe moku: he pa kaha i te hoariri.
word.cebuano: Kay ikaw mao ang usa ka dalangpanan alang kanako, Usa ka malig-ong torre gikan sa kaaway.
word.hebrew: ג  מקצה הארץ אליך אקרא--    בעטף לבי בצור-ירום ממני    תנחני
word.hebrewmodern: כי היית מחסה לי מגדל עז מפני אויב׃
word.greekot: καὶ γὰρ αὐτὸς θεός μου καὶ σωτήρ μου ἀντιλήμπτωρ μου οὐ μὴ σαλευθῶ ἐπὶ πλεῖον

word.kjv: Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขอทรงสดับเสียงของข้าพระองค์เมื่อข้าพระองค์อธิษฐาน ขอทรงสงวนชีวิตของข้าพระองค์ไว้จากความคิดกลัวศัตรู
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: Salmo de David. ESCUCHA, oh Dios, mi voz en mi oración: Guarda mi vida del miedo del enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: In finem. Psalmus David, canticum Jeremiæ, et Ezechielis, populo transmigrationis, cum inciperent exire.
word.italian1927: Per il Capo de’ musici. Salmo di Davide. O Dio, ascolta la mia voce nel mio lamento! Guarda la mia vita dallo spavento del nemico.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, vorzusingen.  Höre, Gott, meine Stimme in meiner Klage; behüte mein Leben vor dem grausamen Feinde.
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Psaume de David. O Dieu, écoute ma voix, quand je gémis! Protège ma vie contre l'ennemi que je crains!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩，交給詩班長。　神啊！我哀訴的時候，求你垂聽我的聲音；求你保護我的性命，脫離仇敵的恐嚇。
word.korean: (다윗의 시. 영장으로 한 노래) 하나님이여, 나의 근심하는 소리를 들으시고 원수의 두려움에서 나의 생명을 보존하소서
word.tagalog: Dinggin mo ang tinig ko, Oh Dios, sa aking hibik: ingatan mo ang buhay ko sa pagkatakot sa kaaway.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. He himene na Rawiri. Whakarongo ki toku reo, e te Atua, ina inoi atu ahau: tiakina toku ora i te wehi o te hoariri.
word.cebuano: Patalinghugi ang akong tingog, Oh Dios, sa akong pangamuyo: Bantayi ang akong kinabuhi gikan sa kahadlok sa kaaway.
word.hebrew: א  למנצח מזמור לדוד
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח מזמור לדוד שמע אלהים קולי בשיחי מפחד אויב תצר חיי׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ ᾠδή ιερεμιου καὶ ιεζεκιηλ ἐκ τοῦ λόγου τῆς παροικίας ὅτε ἔμελλον ἐκπορεύεσθαι

word.kjv: Lift up thy feet unto the perpetual desolations; even all that the enemy hath done wickedly in the sanctuary.
word.thailand: ขอทรงนำย่างพระบาทของพระองค์มายังซากปรักหักพังอยู่เนืองนิตย์ คือมายังสิ่งทั้งปวงที่ถูกศัตรูกระทำอย่างชั่วร้ายในสถานบริสุทธิ์นั้น
word.spanish1909: Levanta tus pies á los asolamientos eternos: A todo enemigo que ha hecho mal en el santuario.
word.latinvulgate: Cum accepero tempus, ego justitias judicabo.
word.italian1927: Dirigi i tuoi passi verso le ruine perpetue; il nemico ha tutto devastato nel tuo santuario.
word.german1912: Hebe deine Schritte zum dem, was so lange wüst liegt. Der Feind hat alles verderbt im Heiligtum.
word.french1910: Porte tes pas vers ces lieux constamment dévastés! L'ennemi a tout ravagé dans le sanctuaire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你舉步去看那些長久荒涼的地方，去看仇敵在聖所裡所行的一切惡事。
word.korean: 영구히 파멸된 곳으로 주의 발을 드십소서 원수가 성소에서 모든 악을 행하였나이다
word.tagalog: Itaas mo ang iyong mga paa sa mga walang hanggang guho, ang lahat na kasamaang ginawa ng kaaway sa santuario.
word.maori: Hiki ake ou waewae ki nga whakangaromanga e mau tonu nei, ki nga mahi kino katoa a te hoariri ki te wahi tapu.
word.cebuano: Sakwata ang imong mga tiil ngadto sa mga pagkalaglag nga walay katapusan, Sa tanang mga kadautan nga gibuhat sa kaaway didto sa balaang puloy-anan.
word.hebrew: ג  הרימה פעמיך למשאות נצח    כל-הרע אויב בקדש
word.hebrewmodern: הרימה פעמיך למשאות נצח כל הרע אויב בקדש׃
word.greekot: διηγήσομαι πάντα τὰ θαυμάσιά σου ὅταν λάβω καιρόν ἐγὼ εὐθύτητας κρινῶ

word.kjv: O God, how long shall the adversary reproach? shall the enemy blaspheme thy name for ever?
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า คู่อริจะเย้ยอยู่นานเท่าใด ศัตรูจะหมิ่นประมาทพระนามของพระองค์เป็นนิตย์หรือ
word.spanish1909: ¿Hasta cuándo, oh Dios, el angustiador nos afrentará? ¿Ha de blasfemar el enemigo perpetuamente tu nombre?
word.latinvulgate: Ego autem annuntiabo in sæculum ; cantabo Deo Jacob.
word.italian1927: Fino a quando, o Dio, oltraggerà l’avversario? Il nemico sprezzerà egli il tuo nome in perpetuo?
word.german1912: Ach Gott, wie lange soll der Widersacher schmähen und der Feind deinen Namen so gar verlästern?
word.french1910: Jusqu'à quand, ô Dieu! l'oppresseur outragera-t-il, L'ennemi méprisera-t-il sans cesse ton nom?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！敵人辱罵你要到幾時呢？仇敵褻慢你的名要到永遠嗎？
word.korean: 하나님이여, 대적이 언제까지 훼방하겠으며 원수가 주의 이름을 영원히 능욕하리이까 ?
word.tagalog: Hanggang kailan, Oh Dios, mangduduwahagi ang kaaway? Lalapastanganin ba ng kaaway ang iyong pangalan magpakailan man?
word.maori: E te Atua, kia pehea ake te roa o te tawai a te hoariri? Ka kohukohu tonu ranei te hoariri ki tou ingoa ake ake?
word.cebuano: Hangtud ba anus-a, Oh Dios, nga ang kabatok magatamay? Magapasipala ba ang kaaway sa imong ngalan sa walay katapusan?
word.hebrew: י  עד-מתי אלהים יחרף צר    ינאץ אויב שמך לנצח
word.hebrewmodern: עד מתי אלהים יחרף צר ינאץ אויב שמך לנצח׃
word.greekot: ἐγὼ δὲ ἀγαλλιάσομαι εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα ψαλῶ τῷ θεῷ ιακωβ

word.kjv: Remember this, that the enemy hath reproached, O LORD, and that the foolish people have blasphemed thy name.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงระลึกข้อนี้ว่า ศัตรูเยาะเย้ยอย่างไร และชนชาติโง่ได้หมิ่นประมาทพระนามของพระองค์อย่างไร
word.spanish1909: Acuerdáte de esto: que el enemigo ha dicho afrentas á Jehová, Y que el pueblo insensato ha blasfemado tu nombre.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ricordati questo: che il nemico ha oltraggiato l’Eterno, e che un popolo stolto ha sprezzato il tuo nome.
word.german1912: So gedenke doch des, daß der Feind den HERRN schmäht und ein töricht Volk lästert deinen Namen.
word.french1910: Souviens-toi que l'ennemi outrage l'Eternel, Et qu'un peuple insensé méprise ton nom!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！仇敵辱罵你，愚頑人褻瀆你的名，求你記念這事。
word.korean: 여호와여, 이것을 기억하소서 원수가 주를 비방하며 우매한 백성이 주의 이름을 능욕하였나이다
word.tagalog: Iyong alalahanin ito, na nangduwahagi ang kaaway, Oh Panginoon, at nilapastangan ng mangmang na bayan ang iyong pangalan.
word.maori: ¶ Kia mahara ki tenei, kua tawai te hoariri, e Ihowa: kua kohukohu te hunga poauau ki tou ingoa.
word.cebuano: Hinumdumi kini, nga ang kaaway nagpakaulaw, Oh Jehova, Ug nga ang buangbuang nga katawohan nagpasipala sa imong ngalan.
word.hebrew: יח  זכר-זאת--אויב חרף יהוה    ועם נבל נאצו שמך
word.hebrewmodern: זכר זאת אויב חרף יהוה ועם נבל נאצו שמך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: They remembered not his hand, nor the day when he delivered them from the enemy.
word.thailand: เขามิได้ระลึกถึงพระหัตถ์ของพระองค์ หรือวันที่พระองค์ทรงช่วยเขาให้พ้นจากคู่อริของเขา
word.spanish1909: No se acordaron de su mano, Del día que los redimió de angustia;
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Non si ricordaron più della sua mano, del giorno in cui egli li liberò dal nemico,
word.german1912: Sie gedachten nicht an seine Hand des Tages, da er sie erlöste von den Feinden;
word.french1910: Ils ne se souvinrent pas de sa puissance, Du jour où il les délivra de l'ennemi,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們忘記了他的能力，就是他救贖他們脫離敵人的日子，
word.korean: 저희가 그의 권능을 기억지 아니하며 대적에게서 구속하신 날도 생각지 아니하였도다
word.tagalog: Hindi nila inalaala ang kaniyang kamay, ni ang araw man nang kaniyang tubusin sila sa kaaway.
word.maori: Kihai ratou i mahara ki tona ringa, ki te ra i whakaorangia ai ratou e ia i te hoariri;
word.cebuano: Wala nila hinumdumi ang iyang kamot, Ni ang adlaw sa iyang pagtubos kanila gikan sa kabatok;
word.hebrew: מב  לא-זכרו את-ידו    יום אשר-פדם מני-צר
word.hebrewmodern: לא זכרו את ידו יום אשר פדם מני צר׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And delivered his strength into captivity, and his glory into the enemy's hand.
word.thailand: และทรงมอบฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์แก่การเป็นเชลย และสง่าราศีของพระองค์แก่มือของคู่อริ
word.spanish1909: Y dió en cautividad su fortaleza, Y su gloria en mano del enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: e lasciò menare la sua Forza in cattività, e lasciò cader la sua Gloria in man del nemico.
word.german1912: und gab seine Macht ins Gefängnis und seine Herrlichkeit in die Hand des Feindes
word.french1910: Il livra sa gloire à la captivité, Et sa majesté entre les mains de l'ennemi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他又把象徵他權能的約櫃交給人擄去，把他的榮美交在敵人的手裡，
word.korean: 그 능력된 자를 포로에 붙이시며 자기 영광을 대적의 손에 붙이시고
word.tagalog: At ibinigay ang kaniyang kalakasan sa pagkabihag, at ang kaniyang kaluwalhatian ay sa kamay ng kaaway.
word.maori: A tukua ana e ia tona kaha hei whakarau, tona kororia ki te ringa o te hoariri.
word.cebuano: Ug gitugyan niya ngadto sa pagkabinihag ang iyang kusog, Ug ang iyang himaya ngadto sa kamot sa kabatok.
word.hebrew: סא  ויתן לשבי עזו    ותפארתו ביד-צר
word.hebrewmodern: ויתן לשבי עזו ותפארתו ביד צר׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The enemy shall not exact upon him; nor the son of wickedness afflict him.
word.thailand: ศัตรูจะเรียกอะไรจากเขาไม่ได้ บุตรแห่งความชั่วร้ายจะกดขี่เขาไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: No lo avasallará enemigo, Ni hijo de iniquidad lo quebrantará.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Il nemico non lo sorprenderà, e il perverso non l’opprimerà.
word.german1912: Die Feinde sollen ihn nicht überwältigen, und die Ungerechten sollen ihn nicht dämpfen;
word.french1910: L'ennemi ne le surprendra pas, Et le méchant ne l'opprimera point;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 仇敵必不能欺騙他，兇惡的人必不能壓迫他。
word.korean: 원수가 저에게서 강탈치 못하며 악한 자가 저를 곤고케 못하리로다
word.tagalog: Hindi dadahas sa kaniya ang kaaway; ni dadalamhatiin man siya ng anak ng kasamaan.
word.maori: E kore te hoariri e whai wahi ki a ia: e kore ano hoki te tama a te kino e tukino i a ia.
word.cebuano: Ang kaaway dili makadaug gikan kaniya, Ni ang anak sa kadautan makasakit kaniya.
word.hebrew: כב  אשר ידי תכון עמו    אף-זרועי תאמצנו
word.hebrewmodern: לא ישא אויב בו ובן עולה לא יעננו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And he saved them from the hand of him that hated them, and redeemed them from the hand of the enemy.
word.thailand: พระองค์จึงทรงช่วยท่านให้พ้นมือของผู้ที่เกลียดชังท่าน และไถ่ท่านจากเงื้อมมือของศัตรู
word.spanish1909: Y salvólos de mano del enemigo, Y rescatólos de mano del adversario.
word.latinvulgate: Sedentes in tenebris et umbra mortis ; vinctos, in mendicitate et ferro.
word.italian1927: E li salvò dalla mano di chi li odiava, e li redense dalla mano del nemico.
word.german1912: und half ihnen von der Hand des, der sie haßte, und erlöste sie von der Hand des Feindes;
word.french1910: Il les sauva de la main de celui qui les haïssait, Il les délivra de la main de l'ennemi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他拯救他們脫離憎恨他們的人的手，從仇敵的手中救贖了他們。
word.korean: 저희를 그 미워하는 자의 손에서 구원하시며 그 원수의 손에서 구속하셨고
word.tagalog: At iniligtas niya sila sa kamay ng nangagtatanim sa kanila, at tinubos niya sila sa kamay ng kaaway.
word.maori: Na whakaorangia ake ratou e ia i te ringa o te tangata i kino ki a ratou; a hokona ana ratou i roto i te ringa o te hoariri.
word.cebuano: Ug iyang giluwas sila gikan sa kamot niya nga nagdumot kanila, Ug gibawi sila gikan sa kamot sa kaaway.
word.hebrew: י  ויושיעם מיד שונא    ויגאלם מיד אויב
word.hebrewmodern: ויושיעם מיד שונא ויגאלם מיד אויב׃
word.greekot: καθημένους ἐν σκότει καὶ σκιᾷ θανάτου πεπεδημένους ἐν πτωχείᾳ καὶ σιδήρῳ

word.kjv: Let the redeemed of the LORD say so, whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy;
word.thailand: ให้ผู้ที่พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงไถ่ไว้แล้วกล่าวดังนั้นเถิด คือผู้ที่พระองค์ทรงไถ่ไว้จากมือของปรปักษ์
word.spanish1909: Digan lo los redimidos de Jehová, Los que ha redimido del poder del enemigo,
word.latinvulgate: Paratum cor meum, Deus, paratum cor meum ; cantabo, et psallam in gloria mea.
word.italian1927: Così dicano i riscattati dall’Eterno, ch’egli ha riscattati dalla mano dell’avversario
word.german1912: So sollen sagen, die erlöst sind durch den HERRN, die er aus der Not erlöst hat
word.french1910: Qu'ainsi disent les rachetés de l'Eternel, Ceux qu'il a délivrés de la main de l'ennemi,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願耶和華救贖的子民這樣稱謝他；這民就是他從敵人的手裡救贖出來，
word.korean: 여호와께 구속함을 받은 자는 이같이 말할지어다 여호와께서 대적의 손에서 저희를 구속하사
word.tagalog: Sabihing gayon ng tinubos ng Panginoon, na kaniyang tinubos sa kamay ng kaaway;
word.maori: Kia pena ano te korero a te hunga i hokona e Ihowa, i hokona nei e ia i roto i te ringa o te hoariri;
word.cebuano: Papamulonga niana ang mga tinubos ni Jehova, Nga gipanubos niya gikan sa kamot sa kabatok,
word.hebrew: ב  יאמרו גאולי יהוה--    אשר גאלם מיד-צר
word.hebrewmodern: יאמרו גאולי יהוה אשר גאלם מיד צר׃
word.greekot: ἑτοίμη ἡ καρδία μου ὁ θεός ἑτοίμη ἡ καρδία μου ᾄσομαι καὶ ψαλῶ ἐν τῇ δόξῃ μου

word.kjv: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.
word.thailand: เพราะศัตรูข่มเหงจิตใจข้าพระองค์ มันขยี้ชีวิตข้าพระองค์ลงถึงดิน มันได้กระทำให้ข้าพระองค์อาศัยในที่มืด เหมือนคนที่ตายนานแล้ว
word.spanish1909: Porque ha perseguido el enemigo mi alma; Ha postrado en tierra mi vida; Hame hecho habitar en tinieblas como los ya muertos.
word.latinvulgate: Domine, quid est homo, quia innotuisti ei ? aut filius hominis, quia reputas eum ?
word.italian1927: Poiché il nemico perseguita l’anima mia; egli calpesta al suolo la mia vita; mi fa abitare in luoghi tenebrosi come quelli che son morti già da lungo tempo.
word.german1912: Denn der Feind verfolgt meine Seele und schlägt mein Leben zu Boden; er legt mich ins Finstere wie die, so längst tot sind.
word.french1910: L'ennemi poursuit mon âme, Il foule à terre ma vie; Il me fait habiter dans les ténèbres, Comme ceux qui sont morts depuis longtemps.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 仇敵逼迫我，把我壓倒在地，使我住在黑暗之處，像死了很久的人一樣。
word.korean: 원수가 내 영혼을 핍박하며 내 생명을 땅에 엎어서 나로 죽은지 오랜 자 같이 흑암한 곳에 거하게 하였나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't pinagusig ng kaaway ang kaluluwa ko; kaniyang sinaktan ang aking buhay ng lugmok sa lupa: kaniyang pinatahan ako sa mga madilim na dako, gaya ng mga namatay nang malaon.
word.maori: Kua tukinotia hoki toku wairua e te hoariri; patua iho e ia toku ora ki raro ki te whenua: meinga ana ahau e ia kia noho i nga wahi pouri, kia rite ki nga tupapaku onamata.
word.cebuano: Kay gilutos sa kaaway ang akong kalag; Iyang gidugmok ang akong kinabuhi ngadto sa yuta: Iyang gipapuyo ako sa mga mangitngit nga dapit, ingon niadtong mga nangamatay sa hataas nang panahon.
word.hebrew: ג  כי רדף אויב נפשי--    דכא לארץ חיתי הושבני במחשכים    כמתי עולם
word.hebrewmodern: כי רדף אויב נפשי דכא לארץ חיתי הושיבני במחשכים כמתי עולם׃
word.greekot: κύριε τί ἐστιν ἄνθρωπος ὅτι ἐγνώσθης αὐτῷ ἢ υἱὸς ἀνθρώπου ὅτι λογίζῃ αὐτόν

word.kjv: Rejoice not when thine enemy falleth, and let not thine heart be glad when he stumbleth:
word.thailand: อย่าเปรมปรีดิ์เมื่อศัตรูของเจ้าล้ม และอย่าให้ใจของเจ้ายินดีเมื่อเขาสะดุด
word.spanish1909: Cuando cayere tu enemigo, no te huelgues; Y cuando tropezare, no se alegre tu corazón:
word.latinvulgate: Cum ceciderit inimicus tuus ne gaudeas, et in ruina ejus ne exsultet cor tuum :
word.italian1927: Quando il tuo nemico cade, non ti rallegrare; quand’è rovesciato, il cuor tuo non ne gioisca,
word.german1912: Freue dich des Falles deines Feindes nicht, und dein Herz sei nicht froh über seinem Unglück;
word.french1910: Ne te réjouis pas de la chute de ton ennemi, Et que ton coeur ne soit pas dans l'allégresse quand il chancelle,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你的仇敵跌倒的時候，你不要歡喜；他絆倒的時候，你心裡不可歡樂。
word.korean: 네 원수가 넘어질 때에 즐거워하지 말며 그가 엎드러질 때에 마음에 기뻐하지 말라
word.tagalog: Huwag kang magalak pagka ang iyong kaaway ay nabubuwal, at huwag matuwa ang iyong puso pagka siya'y nabubuwal:
word.maori: ¶ Kaua e harakoa ki te hinga tou hoariri, kaua hoki tou ngakau e hari ina taka ia:
word.cebuano: Ayaw pag-ikalipay kong ang imong kaaway mapukan, Ug ayaw papagmayaa ang imong kasingkasing kong siya mapukan,
word.hebrew: יז  בנפל אויביך (אויבך) אל-תשמח    ובכשלו אל-יגל לבך
word.hebrewmodern: בנפל אויביך אל תשמח ובכשלו אל יגל לבך׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν πέσῃ ὁ ἐχθρός σου μὴ ἐπιχαρῇς αὐτῷ ἐν δὲ τῷ ὑποσκελίσματι αὐτοῦ μὴ ἐπαίρου

word.kjv: If thine enemy be hungry, give him bread to eat; and if he be thirsty, give him water to drink:
word.thailand: ถ้าศัตรูของเจ้าหิว จงให้อาหารเขารับประทาน และถ้าเขากระหาย จงให้น้ำเขาดื่ม
word.spanish1909: Si el que te aborrece tuviere hambre, dale de comer pan; Y si tuviere sed, dale de beber agua:
word.latinvulgate: Si esurierit inimicus tuus, ciba illum ; si sitierit, da ei aquam bibere :
word.italian1927: Se il tuo nemico ha fame, dagli del pane da mangiare: se ha sete, dagli dell’acqua da bere;
word.german1912: Hungert deinen Feind, so speise ihn mit Brot; dürstet ihn, so tränke ihn mit Wasser.
word.french1910: Si ton ennemi a faim, donne-lui du pain à manger; S'il a soif, donne-lui de l'eau à boire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果你的仇敵餓了，就給他食物吃；如果渴了，就給他水喝，
word.korean: 네 원수가 배고파하거든 식물을 먹이고 목말라하거든 물을 마시우라
word.tagalog: Kung ang iyong kaaway ay magutom, bigyan mo siya ng pagkain na makakain; at kung siya'y mauhaw, bigyan mo siya ng tubig na maiinom:
word.maori: ¶ Ki te matekai tou hoariri whangaia ki te taro; ki te matewai whakainumia ki te wai;
word.cebuano: Kong ang imong kaaway pagagutomon, hatagi siya ug tinapay nga makaon; Ug kong siya pagauhawon, hatagi siya ug tubig nga imnon:
word.hebrew: כא  אם-רעב שנאך האכלהו לחם    ואם-צמא השקהו מים
word.hebrewmodern: אם רעב שנאך האכלהו לחם ואם צמא השקהו מים׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν πεινᾷ ὁ ἐχθρός σου τρέφε αὐτόν ἐὰν διψᾷ πότιζε αὐτόν

word.kjv: Faithful are the wounds of a friend; but the kisses of an enemy are deceitful.
word.thailand: บาดแผลที่มิตรทำก็สุจริต แต่การจุบของศัตรูนั้นก็หลอกลวง
word.spanish1909: Fieles son las heridas del que ama; Pero importunos los besos del que aborrece.
word.latinvulgate: Meliora sunt vulnera diligentis quam fraudulenta oscula odientis.
word.italian1927: Fedeli son le ferite di chi ama; frequenti i baci di chi odia.
word.german1912: Die Schläge des Liebhabers meinen's recht gut; aber die Küsse des Hassers sind gar zu reichlich.
word.french1910: Les blessures d'un ami prouvent sa fidélité, Mais les baisers d'un ennemi sont trompeurs.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 愛你的人加的創傷是出於忠誠；恨你的人卻與你連連親嘴。
word.korean: 친구의 통책은 충성에서 말미암은 것이나 원수의 자주 입맞춤은 거짓에서 난 것이니라
word.tagalog: Tapat ang mga sugat ng kaibigan: nguni't ang mga halik ng kaaway ay malabis.
word.maori: Ko nga patu a te hoa aroha he mea na te pono: ko nga kihi ia a te hoariri auau rawa.
word.cebuano: Matinumanon ang mga samad sa usa ka higala; Apan ang mga halok sa usa ka kaaway malimbongon.
word.hebrew: ו  נאמנים פצעי אוהב    ונעתרות נשיקות שונא
word.hebrewmodern: נאמנים פצעי אוהב ונעתרות נשיקות שונא׃
word.greekot: ἀξιοπιστότερά ἐστιν τραύματα φίλου ἢ ἑκούσια φιλήματα ἐχθροῦ

word.kjv: So shall they fear the name of the LORD from the west, and his glory from the rising of the sun. When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the LORD shall lift up a standard against him.
word.thailand: เขาจึงจะยำเกรงพระนามพระเยโฮวาห์จากตะวันตก และสง่าราศีของพระองค์จากที่ตะวันขึ้น เมื่อศัตรูมาอย่างแม่น้ำเชี่ยว พระวิญญาณของพระเยโฮวาห์จะยกธงขึ้นสู้มัน
word.spanish1909: Y temerán desde el occidente el nombre de Jehová, y desde el nacimiento del sol su gloria: porque vendrá el enemigo como río, mas el espíritu de Jehová levantará bandera contra él.
word.latinvulgate: Et timebunt qui ab occidente nomen Domini, et qui ab ortu solis gloriam ejus, cum venerit quasi fluvius violentus quem spiritus Domini cogit ;
word.italian1927: Così si temerà il nome dell’Eterno dall’occidente, e la sua gloria dall’oriente; quando l’avversario verrà come una fiumana, lo spirito dell’Eterno lo metterà in fuga.
word.german1912: daß der Name des HERRN gefürchtet werde vom Niedergang und seine Herrlichkeit vom Aufgang der Sonne, wenn er kommen wird wie ein aufgehaltener Strom, den der Wind des HERRN treibt.
word.french1910: On craindra le nom de l'Eternel depuis l'occident, Et sa gloire depuis le soleil levant; Quand l'ennemi viendra comme un fleuve, L'esprit de l'Eternel le mettra en fuite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這樣，人從日落之處必敬畏耶和華的名，從日出之地也必敬畏他的榮耀，仇敵像河水沖來的時候，耶和華的氣必向他催逼。
word.korean: 서방에서 여호와의 이름을 두려워하겠고 해돋는 편에서 그 기운에 몰려 급히 흐르는 하수 같이 오실 것임이로다
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y katatakutan nila ang pangalan ng Panginoon mula sa kalunuran, at ang kaniyang kaluwalhatian ay mula sa sikatan ng araw sapagka't siya'y darating na parang bugso ng tubig na pinayaon ng hinga ng Panginoon.
word.maori: Na ka wehingia te ingoa o Ihowa i te uru, tona kororia i te rawhiti. Ka haere mai hoki ia ano he awa e taheke ana, e aia ana e te manawa o Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Sa ingon niana sila nga gikan sa kasadpan mahadlok sa ngalan ni Jehova, ug sa iyang himaya gikan sa subangan sa adlaw, kay siya moanhi ingon sa magabaha nga suba nga gihuyop sa gininhawa ni Jehova.
word.hebrew: יט ויראו ממערב את שם יהוה וממזרח שמש את כבודו  כי יבוא כנהר צר רוח יהוה נססה בו
word.hebrewmodern: וייראו ממערב את שם יהוה וממזרח שמש את כבודו כי יבוא כנהר צר רוח יהוה נססה בו׃
word.greekot: καὶ φοβηθήσονται οἱ ἀπὸ δυσμῶν τὸ ὄνομα κυρίου καὶ οἱ ἀπ' ἀνατολῶν ἡλίου τὸ ὄνομα τὸ ἔνδοξον ἥξει γὰρ ὡς ποταμὸς βίαιος ἡ ὀργὴ παρὰ κυρίου ἥξει μετὰ θυμοῦ

word.kjv: But they rebelled, and vexed his holy Spirit: therefore he was turned to be their enemy, and he fought against them.
word.thailand: แต่เขาทั้งหลายได้กบฏ และทำให้พระวิญญาณบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์เสียพระทัย ฉะนั้นพระองค์จึงทรงหันเป็นศัตรูของเขาทั้งหลาย และพระองค์ทรงต่อสู้กับเขาทั้งหลายเอง
word.spanish1909: Mas ellos fueron rebeldes, é hicieron enojar su espíritu santo; por lo cual se les volvió enemigo, y él mismo peleó contra ellos.
word.latinvulgate: Ipsi autem ad iracundiam provocaverunt, et afflixerunt spiritum Sancti ejus ; et conversus est eis in inimicum, et ipse debellavit eos.
word.italian1927: ma essi furono ribelli, contristarono il suo spirito santo: ond’egli si convertì in loro nemico, ed egli stesso combatté contro di loro.
word.german1912: Aber sie erbitterten und entrüsteten seinen heiligen Geist; darum ward er ihr Feind und stritt wider sie.
word.french1910: Mais ils ont été rebelles, ils ont attristé son esprit saint; Et il est devenu leur ennemi, il a combattu contre eux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 可是，他們竟然悖逆，使他的聖靈憂傷；所以他轉作他們的仇敵，親自攻擊他們。
word.korean: 그들이 반역하여 주의 성신을 근심케 하였으므로 그가 돌이켜 그들의 대적이 되사 친히 그들을 치셨더니
word.tagalog: Nguni't sila'y nanganghimagsik, at namanglaw ang kaniyang banal na Espiritu: kaya't siya'y naging kaaway nila, at siya rin ang nakipaglaban sa kanila.
word.maori: Heoi whakakeke ana ratou, whakapouritia iho e ratou tona wairua tapu. Na ka puta ke ia hei hoariri mo ratou; kei te whawhai ano ia ki a ratou.
word.cebuano: Apan sila naanukol, ug nagpaguol sa iyang balaan nga Espiritu: tungod niini siya nahimo nga ilang kaaway, ug siya sa iyang kaugalingon nakig-away batok kanila.
word.hebrew: י והמה מרו ועצבו את רוח קדשו ויהפך להם לאויב הוא נלחם בם
word.hebrewmodern: והמה מרו ועצבו את רוח קדשו ויהפך להם לאויב הוא נלחם בם׃
word.greekot: αὐτοὶ δὲ ἠπείθησαν καὶ παρώξυναν τὸ πνεῦμα τὸ ἅγιον αὐτοῦ καὶ ἐστράφη αὐτοῖς εἰς ἔχθραν καὶ αὐτὸς ἐπολέμησεν αὐτούς

word.kjv: Go not forth into the field, nor walk by the way; for the sword of the enemy and fear is on every side.
word.thailand: อย่าเดินออกไปในทุ่งนา หรือเดินบนถนน เพราะดาบของศัตรูและความสยดสยองอยู่ทุกด้าน
word.spanish1909: No salgas al campo, ni andes por camino; porque espada de enemigo y temor hay por todas partes.
word.latinvulgate: Nolite exire ad agros, et in via ne ambuletis, quoniam gladius inimici, pavor in circuitu.
word.italian1927: Non uscite nei campi, non camminate per le vie, perché la spada del nemico è là, e il terrore d’ogn’intorno.
word.german1912: Es gehe ja niemand hinaus auf den Acker, niemand gehe über Feld; denn es ist allenthalben unsicher vor dem Schwert des Feindes.
word.french1910: Ne sortez pas dans les champs, N'allez pas sur les chemins; Car là est le glaive de l'ennemi, Et l'épouvante règne à l'entour!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們不要出到田野去，也不要在路上走，因為四圍有仇敵的刀劍和驚嚇。
word.korean: 너희는 밭에도 나가지 말라 길로도 행치말라 대적의 칼이 있고 사방에 두려움이 있음이니라
word.tagalog: Huwag kang lumabas sa parang, o lumakad man sa daan; sapagka't may tabak ng kaaway, at kakilabutan sa bawa't dako.
word.maori: Kei puta atu ki te mara, kaua hoki e haere i te ara; kei reira hoki te hoari a te hoariri, a kei nga taha katoa te wehi.
word.cebuano: Ayaw pag-adto sa uma, ni molakaw ka sa dalan; kay ang pinuti sa kaaway, ug kakugmat, anaa sa tagsatagsa ka kiliran.
word.hebrew: כה אל תצאי (תצאו) השדה ובדרך אל תלכי (תלכו)  כי חרב לאיב מגור מסביב
word.hebrewmodern: אל תצאי השדה ובדרך אל תלכי כי חרב לאיב מגור מסביב׃
word.greekot: μὴ ἐκπορεύεσθε εἰς ἀγρὸν καὶ ἐν ταῖς ὁδοῖς μὴ βαδίζετε ὅτι ῥομφαία τῶν ἐχθρῶν παροικεῖ κυκλόθεν

word.kjv: The LORD said, Verily it shall be well with thy remnant; verily I will cause the enemy to entreat thee well in the time of evil and in the time of affliction.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสว่า "พวกที่เหลืออยู่จะอยู่เย็นเป็นสุข เราจะกระทำให้พวกศัตรูกระทำดีต่อเจ้าในเวลาลำบากและในเวลาทุกข์ใจ
word.spanish1909: Dijo Jehová: De cierto tus reliquias serán en bien; de cierto haré que el enemigo te salga á recibir en el tiempo trabajoso, y en el tiempo de angustia.
word.latinvulgate: Dicit Dominus : Si non reliquiæ tuæ in bonum, si non occurri tibi in tempore afflictionis, et in tempore tribulationis adversus inimicum.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno dice: Per certo, io ti riserbo un avvenire felice; io farò che il nemico ti rivolga supplicazioni nel tempo dell’avversità, nel tempo dell’angoscia.
word.german1912: Der HERR sprach: Wohlan, ich will euer etliche übrigbehalten, denen es soll wieder wohl gehen, und will euch zu Hilfe kommen in der Not und Angst unter den Feinden.
word.french1910: L'Eternel dit: Certes, tu auras un avenir heureux; Certes, je forcerai l'ennemi à t'adresser ses supplications, Au temps du malheur et au temps de la détresse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華說：“我必為你的好處釋放你；在遭遇禍患和災難的時候，我必叫你的仇敵懇求你。
word.korean: 여호와께서 가라사대 내가 진실로 너를 강하게 할 것이요 너로 복을 얻게 할 것이며 내가 진실로 네 대적으로 재앙과 환난의 때에 간구하게 하리라
word.tagalog: Sinabi ng Panginoon, Katotohanang palalakasin kita sa ikabubuti; katotohanang aking pamamanhikin ang kaaway sa iyo sa panahon ng kasamaan at sa panahon ng pagdadalamhati.
word.maori: I mea a Ihowa, He pono ka whakakahangia koe e ahau mo te pai; he pono ka meinga e ahau te hoariri kia inoi ki a koe i te wa o te he, i te wa o te mamae.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova miingon: Sa pagkamatuod, ako magpalig-on kanimo sa gihapon; sa pagkamatuod pagahimoon ko nga magapakilooy kanimo ang imong kaaway sa panahon sa kadaut ug sa panahon sa kasakit.
word.hebrew: יא אמר יהוה אם לא שרותך (שריתיך) לטוב אם לוא הפגעתי בך בעת רעה ובעת צרה--את האיב
word.hebrewmodern: אמר יהוה אם לא שרותך לטוב אם לוא הפגעתי בך בעת רעה ובעת צרה את האיב׃
word.greekot: γένοιτο δέσποτα κατευθυνόντων αὐτῶν εἰ μὴ παρέστην σοι ἐν καιρῷ τῶν κακῶν αὐτῶν καὶ ἐν καιρῷ θλίψεως αὐτῶν εἰς ἀγαθὰ πρὸς τὸν ἐχθρόν

word.kjv: I will scatter them as with an east wind before the enemy; I will shew them the back, and not the face, in the day of their calamity.
word.thailand: เราจะให้เขากระจัดกระจายออกไปดุจถูกพัดด้วยลมตะวันออกต่อหน้าศัตรู เราจะหันหลังให้เขา ไม่ใช่หันหน้าให้ ในวันแห่งความหายนะของเขานั้น"
word.spanish1909: Como viento solano los esparciré delante del enemigo; mostraréles las espaldas, y no el rostro, en el día de su perdición.
word.latinvulgate: Sicut ventus urens dispergam eos coram inimico : dorsum, et non faciem, ostendam eis in die perditionis eorum.
word.italian1927: Io li disperderò dinanzi al nemico, come fa il vento orientale; io volterò loro le spalle e non la faccia nel giorno della loro calamità.
word.german1912: Denn ich will sie wie durch einen Ostwind zerstreuen vor ihren Feinden; ich will ihnen den Rücken, und nicht das Antlitz zeigen, wenn sie verderben.
word.french1910: Pareil au vent d'orient, je les disperserai devant l'ennemi; Je leur tournerai le dos, je ne les regarderai pas au jour de leur détresse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在他們的敵人面前，我要像東風吹散他們；在他們遭難的日子，我必使他們只見我的背，不見我的面。”
word.korean: 내가 그들을 그 원수 앞에서 흩기를 동풍으로 함같이 할 것이며 그들의 재난의 날에는 내가 그들에게 등을 보이고 얼굴을 보이지 아니하리라
word.tagalog: Aking pangangalatin sila na parang hanging silanganan sa harap ng kaaway; tatalikuran ko sila, at hindi ko haharapin, sa kaarawan ng kanilang kasakunaan,
word.maori: Ka titaritaria ratou e ahau ano na te hau marangi i te aroaro o te hoariri; ka titiro ahau ki to ratou tuara, kahore ki to ratou kanohi, i te ra o to ratou aitua.
word.cebuano: Sila pagapatlaagon ko ingon nga inubanan sa hangin sa timogan sa atubangan sa kaaway; pakitaon ko sila sa boko-boko, ug dili sa nawong, sa adlaw sa ilang kagul-anan.
word.hebrew: יז כרוח קדים אפיצם לפני אויב ערף ולא פנים אראם ביום אידם  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: כרוח קדים אפיצם לפני אויב ערף ולא פנים אראם ביום אידם׃
word.greekot: ὡς ἄνεμον καύσωνα διασπερῶ αὐτοὺς κατὰ πρόσωπον ἐχθρῶν αὐτῶν δείξω αὐτοῖς ἡμέραν ἀπωλείας αὐτῶν

word.kjv: All thy lovers have forgotten thee; they seek thee not; for I have wounded thee with the wound of an enemy, with the chastisement of a cruel one, for the multitude of thine iniquity; because thy sins were increased.
word.thailand: คนรักทั้งสิ้นของเจ้าได้ลืมเจ้าเสีย เขาทั้งหลายไม่แสวงหาเจ้าแล้ว เพราะเราตีเจ้าอย่างการโบยตีของศัตรู เป็นการลงโทษอย่างของคนโหดร้าย เพราะว่าความชั่วช้าของเจ้าก็มากมาย เพราะว่าบาปของเจ้าก็ทวีขึ้น
word.spanish1909: Todos tus enamorados te olvidaron; no te buscan; porque de herida de enemigo te herí, con azote de cruel, á causa de la muchedumbre de tu maldad, y de la multitud de tus pecados.
word.latinvulgate: Omnes amatores tui obliti sunt tui, teque non quærent : plaga enim inimici percussi te castigatione crudeli : propter multitudinem iniquitatis tuæ dura facta sunt peccata tua.
word.italian1927: Tutti i tuoi amanti t’hanno dimenticata, non si curano più di te; poiché io t’ho percossa come si percuote un nemico, t’ho inflitto la correzione d’un uomo crudele, per la grandezza della tua iniquità, perché i tuoi peccati sono andati aumentando.
word.german1912: Alle deine Liebhaber vergessen dein, und fragen nichts darnach. Ich habe dich geschlagen, wie ich einen Feind schlüge, mit unbarmherziger Staupe um deiner großen Missetat und deiner starken Sünden willen.
word.french1910: Tous ceux qui t'aimaient t'oublient, Aucun ne prend souci de toi; Car je t'ai frappée comme frappe un ennemi, Je t'ai châtiée avec violence, A cause de la multitude de tes iniquités, Du grand nombre de tes péchés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你所有的盟友都忘記了你，不再關心你；我擊打了你，好像仇敵擊打你，又好像殘暴的人懲罰你一樣；都因你的罪孽甚多，你的罪惡無數。
word.korean: 너를 사랑하던 자가 다 너를 잊고 찾지 아니하니 이는 네 허물이 크고 네 죄가 수다함을 인하여 내가 대적의 상하게 하는 그것으로 너를 상하게 하며 잔학한 자의 징계하는 그것으로 너를 징계함이어늘
word.tagalog: Nilimot ka ng lahat na mangingibig sa iyo; hindi ka nila hinahanap: sapagka't sinugatan kita ng sugat ng kaaway, ng parusa ng mabagsik; dahil sa kalakhan ng iyong kasamaan, sapagka't ang iyong mga kasalanan ay dumami.
word.maori: Ko te hunga katoa i aroha ki a koe kua wareware ki a koe; kahore ratou e rapu i a koe; no te mea i patua koe e ahau ki te patu a te hoariri, ki te whiu hoki a te tangata nanakia; he nui hoki no tou kino, he maha no ou hara.
word.cebuano: Ang tanan mong mga hinigugma nangalimot kanimo; sila wala mangita kanimo; kay gisamaran ko ikaw sa samad sa usa ka kaaway, sa hampak sa tawong mabangis, tungod sa pagkadaku sa imong kasal-anan, kay ang imong mga sala mingdaghan.
word.hebrew: יד כל מאהביך שכחוך אותך לא ידרשו  כי מכת אויב הכיתיך מוסר אכזרי--על רב עונך עצמו חטאתיך
word.hebrewmodern: כל מאהביך שכחוך אותך לא ידרשו כי מכת אויב הכיתיך מוסר אכזרי על רב עונך עצמו חטאתיך׃
word.greekot: διὰ τοῦτο ἀκούσατε βουλὴν κυρίου ἣν ἐβουλεύσατο ἐπὶ τὴν ιδουμαίαν καὶ λογισμὸν αὐτοῦ ὃν ἐλογίσατο ἐπὶ τοὺς κατοικοῦντας θαιμαν ἐὰν μὴ συμψησθῶσιν τὰ ἐλάχιστα τῶν προβάτων ἐὰν μὴ ἀβατωθῇ ἐπ' αὐτὴν κατάλυσις αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Thus saith the LORD; Refrain thy voice from weeping, and thine eyes from tears: for thy work shall be rewarded, saith the LORD; and they shall come again from the land of the enemy.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสดังนี้ว่า "ระงับเสียงร้องไห้คร่ำครวญไว้ และระงับน้ำตาจากตาของเจ้าเสีย เพราะว่าการงานของเจ้าจะได้รับรางวัล พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสดังนี้แหละ และเขาทั้งหลายจะกลับมาจากแผ่นดินของศัตรู"
word.spanish1909: Así ha dicho Jehová: Reprime tu voz del llanto, y tus ojos de las lágrimas; porque salario hay para tu obra, dice Jehová, y volverán de la tierra del enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: Hæc dicit Dominus : Quiescat vos tua a ploratu, et oculi tui a lacrimis, quia est merces operi tuo, ait Dominus, et revertentur de terra inimici :
word.italian1927: Così parla l’Eterno: Trattieni la tua voce dal piangere, i tuoi occhi dal versar lagrime; poiché l’opera tua sarà ricompensata, dice l’Eterno: essi ritorneranno dal paese del nemico;
word.german1912: Aber der HERR spricht also: Laß dein Schreien und Weinen und die Tränen deiner Augen; denn deine Arbeit wird wohl belohnt werden, spricht der HERR. Sie sollen wiederkommen aus dem Lande des Feindes;
word.french1910: Ainsi parle l'Eternel: Retiens tes pleurs, Retiens les larmes de tes yeux; Car il y aura un salaire pour tes oeuvres, dit l'Eternel; Ils reviendront du pays de l'ennemi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華這樣說：“止住你的聲音，不要哭泣，抑制你的眼睛不要再流淚，因為你所作的必有果效；他們必從仇敵之地回來。”這是耶和華的宣告。
word.korean: 나 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 네 소리를 금하여 울지 말며 네 눈을 금하여 눈물을 흘리지 말라 네 일에 갚음을 받을 것인즉 그들이 그 대적의 땅에서 돌아오리라 여호와의 말이니라
word.tagalog: Ganito ang sabi ng Panginoon, Iyong pigilin ang iyong tinig sa pagiyak, at ang iyong mga mata sa mga luha: sapagka't gagantihin ang iyong mga gawa, sabi ng Panginoon; at sila'y magsisibalik na mula sa lupain ng kaaway.
